Good experience. Being in Nepal for the first time, this was a very good experience with Adventure Connextion. Although we had some prolems with the size of the group, jointly we managed to find a good way so that all participants were having a great time.Good and knowledgeable guides, porters and management.Will certainly work with them again when coming back to Napal

Mustang trek. Awesome experience with the Adventure Connexion group. The team was able to cater to the varied capability levels of our large team and still manage a good experience for all. They managed a nice combination of slight stretch while not over extending anyone by much. Good experience for all. Would love to come back for another trek in the Nepal Himalayas.

Mustang trek. We were a big group, with different capacity levels. Taking us on a long trek was indeed a challenge. Kulendra and Adhikari did a good job with this trek. Their personal touch and involvement is highly appreciated by all.

Amazing Kathmandu valley tour. We were very impressed of the whole Kathmandu valley tour. First of all, the punctuality of our guide mukesh and the driver. We were given information at all times along the car ride. Mukesh is very informative and friendly. The driver krishna was always polite and very attention to details program and his driving is safe. The krishna temple at patan and natpole temple was an amazing experience. We've never get this close to heritage sites before. The lunch was amazing too. Probably the best Nepalese food we've had since we arrived in Nepal.Overall, we were very happy with the tour, our guide (Mukesh) and the driver (Krishna). It's worth it.

Adventure Connexion private tour that never was. We booked day tour with Adventure Connexion to see Kathmandu valley and other city highlights and we had a wonderful time in Nepal. The tour guide (Bishnu), he is extremely knowledgeable about the history of the places we visited, full of interesting facts about everything we saw or asked about. He was flexible and accommodating - for example one of our party didn't feel well that morning, so he adapted the schedule to pick her up at lunch time and still cover the sights we wanted to see. He has a lot of energy and enthusiasm and made the day a lot of fun. I highly recommend Adventure Connexion.

Everest Base Camp Trek. The guys at Adventure Connexion provided a great first trip to Nepal! My flight was behind schedule by 2 hours and they were there waiting for me first thing at the airport. Having Adventure Connexion take care of all the permits and logistics of going on the trek and providing a very experienced guide made for a hassle free and extremely enjoyable trek. The entire trek was well planned and made great use of time. The entire Adventure Connexion team were very helpful and willing to do anything to make it a great trip.
Helpful and Flexible. Loved trekking in Nepal and the organizers were flexible when circumstances required change in schedule.

Manaslu Trek. This was my first visit to Nepal and my expectations were surpassed in every way. One of the most important things I learned while travelling though Nepal is how valuable an experienced, local guide team is. Adventure Connexion had all of our permits, paperwork, travel logistics etc sorted out before we arrived which saved us DAYS of waiting in lines and planning. Whenever there were modifications necessary to our original plans (impassable roads, landslides, delays due to religious holidays, last minute decision to go to Chitwan etc), RB and his team made the necessary adjustments smoothly and seamlessly, so that every part of our trip was a pleasant experience . Small attention to details also mattered a lot: arriving at our teahouse at the end of every day to a steaming cup of tea, our bags already in our rooms, snacks before supper... Such a treat! Nepal is even more beautiful than I imagined: the scenery is breathtaking and the people will steal your heart with their kindness and generosity of spirit. They are always smiling, laughing, ever eager to please. The quality and variety of food along the circuit was also a pleasant surprise. The Adventure Connexion team went over and above when it came to accommodating a gluten allergy in our group. We were so pleased with our adventure and feel lucky to have been referred to RB and his guide team to walk us through our first trip to Nepal. The love they feel for their country is reflected in their passion for what they do. We highly recommend Adventure Connection to our friends and family who are planning a trip to Nepal.

¨Mustang Trekking". Kulendra has organized the Mustang trekking. We were a group of six people, with two guides and three porters. The trekking has worked very well and the leaders as well as the porters did an excellent job.

Manaslu 15 day trek. First time in Nepal but not the last, great experience. What made it all so amazing was Adventure connexion with RB as our guide. He was there the moment we landed at the airport and guided us through all the transportation,Hotels,restaurants,our trek, and a few extras like jungle tour, shopping etc. Thanks to RB I am would recommend this to everyone.

Phenomenal experience. Kulendra organized the Everest Base Camp trek for my party of two and we had an amazing experience. Not only did he set it up for us in a very short time frame (1 month) but he was also helpful with our desire to bungee jump using a different company. Kulendra was professional, trustworthy and extremely accommodating. The trek itself wAs a once in a lifetime experience. Our guide was kind and helpful. He met our every need given our last minute changes here and there. The views are out of this world. I have so many pictures to brag with! The Nepalese people are friendly and warm. I wish I could do it all over again. Thanks Kulendra, you ensured this to be a wonderful holiday.

Manaslu trek Nepal. This was my third time to Nepal and my husband's fifth. Our fabulous guide RB, owner of Adventure Connexion, was tremendous once again. We first met RB nine year ago when he guided us through Tibet. This time we brought our daughter and son-in-law on their first adventure in this spectacular country. We have had the privilege to travel all around the world and all I can say that this trip was the best organized one we have ever been on! That is a tall order for this nation of so little material goods but with such a calm an generous spirit. Despite difficult conditions on the roads because of late monsoon rains we travelled to our mountain trekking start up points without difficulty. The Manaslu trek was outstanding, the tea houses great and our porters strong and friendly. All four of us highly recommend Adventure Connexion and plan on using them again!

Magnificent Annapurna trek. Kulendra with this company organised a great trekking holiday for me in Nepal.....it was the Annapurna circuit....a truly memorable experience. It was well organised before I got to Nepal and met up with Samsher in Kathmandu. All went smoothly on my trek through the tiny Nepalese villages on the circuit staying overnight at teahouses. The circuit took us through villages such as Beshisahar, Chamje, Chame, Pisang, Braga and Manang on our way to the Thorung La pass (5416m) and onto Jonsom where we took the plane to Pokhara. He had then organised a stay at the Chitwan Safari Park before returning to Kathmandu....again everything went smoothly. I was made to feel really welcome and would recommend the organisation for treks/holidays in this area.

Kathmandu Valley trek. 4 day trek around Kathmandu Valley including city tour.Adventure Connection was very professional and offer detailed information. Our kid was knowledgeable and personal.Happily recommended.

Trek in Mustang. We trek 2 weeks in Mustang with this company, and absolutely no remarks: 100 % success ! the guide took the good and practical décisons to avoid disagrement regarding Meteo surprises ! and the team was really friendly. I will trek again with them. I also spend some days In Katmandu: very good wellcome by RB and kulendra. I really recommend them.

Kathmandu Tour. My last month visit to Nepal was awesome. RB and other guys at ADVENTURE CONNEXION WERE AWESOME. Kathmandu , bhaktapur was awesome ancient city of Nepal and rich in cultural heritage. Very nice people and had lots of fun with my family. All the credit goes to our tour guide and Adventure Connexion.

Exotic trip to Mustang valley of "Annapurna Region" , Nepal. As all the other reviews indicate, RB and Kulendra are lovely gentlemans that takes great pride in his business and consistently providing the best service. My husband and I recently booked a tour with Adventure Connexion for our mustang trek and we were not disappointed. Despite a couple of minor hiccups, Adventure Connexion, went above and beyond our expectations to rectify this. RB really took the hassle out of organizing a trekking experience in Nepal.

Trek. I did a 3 days trekking with this company and had a great experience. Everything was taking care of and I really enjoyed amazing landscapes with my friends thanks to a great guide and a nice sherpa. Accomodations along the way were handeled by really nice locals. A good experience that I would recommand

Trekk in Nepal, easy and safe. This trekking agency has a good experience and insure you safety during the trip. Which is not always the case in Nepal! You will be free to plan with the director of the agency the trip that fits you! Very good organization : all our needs were taken into account !  I strongly recommend the trekkers to choose wisely their trekking agency and this one is a very good choice!

Traveling with Adventure Connexion. Since my first time in Nepal, I came back a few times to see different parts of Nepal: from south to north, life, people and landscape is very different and it's interesting to see and live these differences. I always travel with Adventure Connexion, because they are serious, helpful and arrange holidays like you want: more touristic or more sportive. Your are shure to have unique holidays like no one would have!Try it!

MANASLU TOUR. Memories of the Manaslu Tour trek ! The organization was perfect, as well as the atmosphere. I always felt safe. The team (guides, sherpas, cooks, porters...) has been very attentive, efficient, very friendly.I strongly advise you ADVENTURE CONNEXION for your future treks to the Nepal.The Nepalese are very endearing, friendly, caring people...This trek is for me one of my most beautiful trips. I also plans to start again with ADVENTURE CONNEXION for a next Nepali adventure.

very good sperience in Nepal. Nepal is for me the most beautiful place in the world, i have had the opporutnity to know the highest mountains in the planet, thanks adventure conexión for make me in my hollidays my dreams rality. are very profesional and friendly, im recommend everybody.thaks Adventure conexion

Excellent!. I truly appreciate Mr. Buddhi & Blue Mountain Travels for providing us the excellent service from Pokhra to Kathmandu [round trip]. The vehicle { Scorpio} was clean, well maintained and very comfortable. Also the driver they provided was very courteous,punctual and well behaved. He was well experienced driver. Had a great experience!
Shepher Prabhakar
New Delhi, India

Must do!. What a fabulous view! My wife and I booked this after we arrived in Kathmandu, and we were so glad we did...everyone gets a window seat, along with an opportunity to head up to the cockpit for a pilots view! The Himalayas are absolutely breathtaking, and Everest is inspiring. A great way to get to the top without the effort! Don't miss it!

Short trip, but so much fun!. We booked all of our activities for our short Nepal trip with Blue Mountain Travels, and they did not disappoint! For our 4 days in Kathmandu, Mr. Basnet arranged a mountain flight, 2-day trek to Nagarkot, and a cultural sightseeing day. Every single event was enlightening and amazing. Mr. Basnet and his staff were very professional and accommodating. Our trekking guide, Ram, was excellent, professional, and patient. We're already planning our next trip to Nepal and will likely use Blue Mountain again.
Mountain view from the top. Unforgettable journey, nice service. Really exciting, was feeling like son of thunder who travels through cloud.

Trek to Poonnhill via Yanapool & Ghorepani. We used Blue Mountain travel for this short trek & were delighted with the service provided by our tour guide Yaka Simkhada.He met us at our hotel in Pokhara & was there with us all the way to the end of our tour. He was the complete professional versatile & multi-talented. He was always at hand to see to all our needs and making sure we enjoyed our trek. Regaling us with anecdotes of local legends, the Geography, history and frequent answers to "are we there yet" paying due consideration to our physical condition & the remaining distance. His singing of the famous sherpa song Resham Firiri which we all enjoyed and sang was inspiring. We thoroughly enjoyed the trek & landscape which was amazing. Hope to be back fitter and in better shape to tackle a longer trek & will use Blue mountain travels again.Romesh & Sharmini

5 day Trek - best guide - Ram Bhattarai!! . We decided to go with Blue Mountain travel as we were staying in their homestay whilst in Kathmandu. It's a bit of a gamble with who to go with as there are hundreds of trekking companies all trying to get your business. We are so glad we decided to go with Blue Mountain purely because of our guide Ram.From the moment we met Ram he was a kind and friendly guy. He was always positive and happy. I was quite slow and he never made me feel bad about it which I was thankful for. He chose us good accommodation and places to eat and told us lots of information throughout the trek. He even sat with us at dinner, I noticed a lot of guides didn't do this. The Poon Hill trek was a great taster of the Himalayas, it's a good trek if you haven't done much walking before and you are short on time. At times it was a little tough in the heat but the amazing views and the thought of dal baaht for dinner made it worth it! We were sad to say bye to Ram as it felt like we had been with a good friend for 5 days. You will not be disappointed if you have a trek with him! Thank you Ram and Blue Mountain!

Trusted and Reliable Travel Service. I had made the booking for the vehicle online only. Initially I was apprehensive whether the driver would be there at the Airport on time or not. But all my worries vanished when Mr. Basnet assured me that I need not worry anything about the vehicle as the driver would be there at the Airport to receive us. True to his words, he chalked our 6 day's itinerary carefully keeping our interests in mind. Deepak, the driver was also very experienced. Overall a very satisfying experience. Really nice on the part of Mr. Basnet when he came personally to drop us at the airport. I will definitely recommend them to any visitor in Nepal.
Excellent service ever!!. This is a second time for visiting Nepal and i still use this service from this company. Both owner (Mr. Bhuddi) and trekking guide (Mr. Rum) are great!

A wonderful experience with Blue Mountain. I have found Blue Mountain from TripAdvisor, and heard a good reputation of Mr. Buddhi. Then i have booked the 7 days trip of mine through Mr. Buddhi. We were 5 persons in the group, and we had both children and older person in the group. Mr. Buddhi has provided an excellent service to us throughout the tour. The transport was with us since we arrived at Airport, and until we again fly back to own country. We covered all the sight seeing places at Kathmandu, Pokhara, Nagorkot, Bhaktapur. Our assigned driver Mr. Kushal was also an excellent person. Most importantly, Mr. Buddhi is so friendly and helpful. He organized the tour according to our demand exactly.Though i haven't booked the hotel through him, but he also provide help in booking hotels and tours or activities even.So, really i recommend Blue Mountain Travel for a comfortable and safe trip.

Driving Tours. Great touring company. My girlfriend and I went on two day trips with another couple friend and had a wonderful time. We saw 7 different areas in the outskirt Kathmandu area between the two days. I would highly recommend to any couple our small group to book a private car through Blue Mountain Travels.

Poon hill trek with Blue Mountain Travel Nepal. Blue Mountain Travels amended a trek for us as we had very limited time in Nepal. All at the company were extremely informative and helpful. They made the booking as easy as possible when taking into consideration different currencies and difficult or limited bank transfers. Our guide Milan Gurung was extremely friendly, helpful and energetic. His English is excellent and his knowledge of the mountains and area surrounding was fantastic. He kept our energy up during the trek and ensured we had fun throughout. As it was early September the rain can dampen spirits on the trek but with his great optimisim and hope, we completed the trek in great time and we even saw the amazing Annapurna mountain view. It was spectacular. Thank you to Blue mountains, Milan and our wonderful Porter Gorkhali for creating the perfect affordable trek which we would highly recommend to all. We can't wait to return and experience a new route with our now friends.

Visit To Pashupatinath Nepal. I visited Nepal for Darshan of Pashuptinath along with my wife, my friend and his wife. In nepal we visited Kathmandu,Lumbini, Pokahara and Manokamana. We hired the TAXI from Blue Mountain Travel who offered lowest fare as low as 50% from some TAXI Operators. Sh Budhdi MD was very help full and courteous. If the rating is done I will give Sh Budhdi and his Blue Mountain Travel 100% out of 100
Fantastic experience. Great trekking to ABC. All staffs and trekking guide were amazing and very helpful. Will definitely come back again for other trips with Blue Mountain.

5 day visit to Nepal. As this was our first trip to Nepal we were very grateful for a fully organized trip! We usually plan trips ourselves, but choosing to let Blue Mountain do it for us was a good decision - as all we had to do was show up (and pay of course :))! We also had our first trek and our kind and patient guide Mr. Yaka was a great companion. The weather didn't work in our favor, but we had a great time all the same!

Great service throughout trek. Had a great trek with Krishna, who was very nice and spoke great English. When I suffered altitude sickness at basecamp, Blue Mountain took care of the details to get me back safely to Kathmandu and checked into a hospital. Specifically Bharat was fantastic in arranging everything from taxis to night stays to everything in between.

5 days in Kathmandu & around!. Mr. Buddhi was helpful in deciding our travel travel itinerary. As I was traveling with dad and reserved the hotel only in Kathmandu, we were interested in day trips! We covered: Boudhnath, Boudhastupa, Manokamana temple, Patan square, Kathmandu durbar square, Bhaktapur, Nagarkot, Pashupatinath, Kopan Monastry and Boudhneelkanth. The pricing was similar as mentioned in his website, which is reasonable.Our driver was trustworthy and friendly.If you are looking for a comfortable travel, I will suggest you to book with Mr. Buddhi's Blue Mountain.

Two day trek. Came to Blue Mountain and they were so great at arranging our trip. Arranged a day of sightseeing and a driver, and arranged a two-night trek in the mountains. The Trek was amazing, incredible views and great hiking. Our guide, Krishna, was awesome and very helpful. Although we don't usually hire guides, we were very thankful for him and couldn't have done it ourselves. Highly recommend trekking with Krishna and the Blue Mountain travels company.

Tourism. Mr.Buddhi is very helpful..he arranged all our accommodation and transport..we hired a scorpio from blue mountains..the scorpio was in good condition and the driver Mr.Deepak was of very friendly nature.Overall Blue Mountain is providing a good service..so i will recommend Blue Mountains if someone is thinking to visit Nepal.

Wonderful trek made even more fantastic by Milan. First of all what really impressed me about blue mountain travels is the price. There are many very expensive trekking companies out there but I found blue mountain travels to be very reasonably priced. The trip was very well planned so I didn't need to think too hard about anything. Milan (my personal guide) was the person who made the trip fantastic for me though. He was very thoughtful and always walked at my pace as well as being very knowledgable about trekking and being very friendly. Would definitely recommend!!

Smooth trip with zero tension. Buddhi arranged a spacious Tata Manza with driver Deepak. Deepak was good in communication and a gentleman to the core. I travelled with my father-in-law who is 81 years old. All sightseeings were done in a smooth way. It was raining all the time. But we had no problem as we carried umbrella. And all this arrangement was done online over mail and phone. In that sense Blue Mountain is very transparent in pricing and does a fair dealing. I strongly recommend Blue Mountain Travels.

it was pleasent journey with Blue mountain travels. We were travelling with 2 kids therefore, was worried about tours. Normally people commits something however, doesn't fullfill in actual. However after meeting with Driver and Car we were relaxed. Because Mr. Buddhi's (MD) kept his commitment as he said during discussions.  Car condition was excellent, Driver behaviour was friendly in nature. Particularly Deepak (Driver) was having enough knowledge about tours and its comforts. Overall we enjoyed the tours and definetely recommend this travels.

Expert driver. This was our second trip to Nepal and our second drive to Pokhara from Kathmandu so we were very familiar with the drive. On our first trip with a different company our driver was very fast and took too many risks. This time we booked with Blue Mountain and our driver Dipak was a very experienced driver but was also very safe. Due to road works in 2 locations it was a very long drive, 9 hours! Luckily for us Dipak is a lovely, friendly guy and was happy to chat and laugh with us the whole way. About 3/4 of the was to Pokhara I foolishly left my phone at a roadside restaurant. Dipak kindly drove back the next day to retrieve it for me of his own accord. Dipak was also very knowledgeable and happy to answer our questions and spoke excellent English. Mr Buddhi was very kind and amiable, we would book with this company again. Dhanyabad.

Blue Mountain the Best. Mr. Buddhi of Blue Mountain was very courteous and humble. We booked Toyota Hice for our tour from Mr. Buddhi for 6 days.The Driver Prakash was very jolly fellow. Singing hindi and nepali songs for us. Well mannered and always smiling.Mr. Budhi also took care of all our requirements and the trip was excellent, with cooperation of Mr. Budhi.Anyone visiting Nepal, Should talk to Mr. Buddhi and finalise the tour.regardsRamesh Agarwal, Advocate Orissa High Court+91-9437035453Cuttack

Nepal tour. We travelled as a group of 6, including a 75 year old and a 7 year old. We hired a van and driver from Blue Mountain travels for 6 days and travelled from KTM to Pokhara and back. We visited the usual sights like Sarangkot, Nagarkot, Devi's falls, Mahendra cave, Fewa lake, etc... Prakash was our designated driver and he was very friendly and pleasant. We had a new Toyota Hiace. The pricing was reasonable and all inclusive. We didn't have any issues, I would highly recommend using Blue Mountain travels for your travel needs in Nepal.

Kathmandu-Pokhara-Chitwan. It was excellent and hassle free by engaging Mr. Buddhi of Blue Moutain Travells. He had arranged good vehicle for our 7 day trip and our stay at good hotels in Kathmandu and Pokhara. The trip to Chitwan was excellent though the hotel room was not clean. We had given the feedback to Mr. Buddhi and he taken it in a positive manner. The trip was well arranged and taken care. A big thanks for Mr. Buddhi and his team.

Eye-opening trek to Poon Hill. My friend an I visited Nepal in May 2016 and trekked to Poon Hill with Blue Mountain Travels. Our knowledgeable, fun, and personable guide Raj arranged transportation to and from Pokhara for us and secured accommodations at the friendliest, safest and most beautiful guest houses on the trails. His knowledge of the local culture and of the mountains helped us to absorb everything the mountains have to offer—much more than if we had gone on our own. My friend and I also wanted to change our itinerary midway through to make it to the hot springs and our guide was very flexible in adapting our trekking schedule. We left the country with a new Nepali friend and for that I highly recommend using Blue Mountain for any trekking needs in Nepal!

5 star travel with 2 star price. we spent a week in nepal from Kathmandu-Nagarkot-Pokhara-Kathmandu with blue mountain travel.we rent car toyota Hiace with AC and driver name Prakesh.The price its very reasonable and we get special discount that we not get from other.Prakes its very nice, funny, and generous. With Prakesh you're won't feel that you just go with your driver, he just like brother for us (5 women), its fun for us.Prakesh driver skill are excellent, hope blue mountain travel driver are have the same skills as him.my recommendation for improvement, i hope Prakes can bring more tshirt for his trip, during our trip we saw he only wear 2 different colour hehehheheee...we just worried he not changed it.thanks Buddhi to let us have a nice fun and safety trip with Prakesh

Nice trek to Poon hill. We were travelling as 2 ladies up to Poon hill during 11-15 April. Our friendly guide, Mr.Mlian was very nice. We trusted him for accommodations and meals which always great every day during the trek. He really helped us a lot.Unfortunately, on the morning that we were at the poon hill, the weather was not good. So we didn't see the mountains clearly as we expected. It was our unlucky.However, blue mountain is very nice trekking service company. We got cheap flights to Pokhara and also cheap one-day Kathmandu sight seeing tour.Reccommend!

Kumar. The blue mountain travel had been excellent. The owner Mr Buddhi has been very creative and accommodating. I send my travel plans from Kolkata for a 5 day visit to Kathmandu Pokhra and surroundings. He made a very reasonable quote. The driver was available at the Airport. From then on they took care of all my travel requirements. Whatever adjustment I requested was done in same price. Vehicles were new and well kept. I am very thankful to M/S Blue Mountain travels for making my trip excellent. Very high quality hospitality. Highly recommended.

Great experience in Nepal with excellen service of Blue Mountain Traveles. We have spend 7 days in Nepal - Kathmandu and neighbor districts (sightseeing) - elephant jungle safari - rafting and small tracking form Pokhara. Everything was perfectly organized. Special thanks to our driver who was taking care of us all time.

Great customized service!. We travelled as a group of 5 ladies to Nepal. We booked transportation and driver for our a week stay in the country. The pre-trip discussion via e-mail with Mr Buddhi was very smooth and he answered all our inquiries directly and promptly. Our driver Mr Prakash was so knowledgable and safely driving us around Kathmandu- Nagarkot- Bhaktapur and Pokhara. He was also very nice making sure we are all okay during the trip. The pick-ups were always on time.Plus... Mr Buddhi and his family invited us over for dinner and we were served with Nepali delicacies, we felt so welcomed and honored! Thanks to Prakash, Mr Buddhi and family also to everyone at Happy Home hotel Kathmandu (also owned by Mr Buddhi) for all your service. We enjoyed Nepal!I recommend Blue Mountain to help you enjoy Nepal. Good job!

Excellent service. I travel to nepal with my brother, and select this agency for trekking abc and homestay.during time we trek to dovan my brother had some accidence ,he cannt continue trek,Milan(my porterguide) help us so much.he advice everything about how to manage it,contact to Bharat(the office manager) for sending rescue heli,so i can continue to finish trekking on condition my brother is safe.i think this agency has really good teamwork .i like them.

Excellent, Reliable and Trustworthy. This was our 2nd visit to Nepal and also our 2nd experience with Blue mountain travels. As before they did not disappoint us. We stayed in Nepal for 28 days and booked our hotels and airport pickup through Blue mountain. Everything got booked just as we wanted. The agency is very reliable, trustworthy and the service is excellent. Whenever we plan to visit Nepal again we will book our trips and hotels through Blue mountain for sure.

Exellent Trekking with our guide Milan!. Me and my wife went trekking to the Ghorepani/Poonhill/Grandruk village 5-day trek by Blue Mountin Travels Agency. Our Guide was Milan Gurung. He is a friendly young man and a good professional guide. He was hired only as our guide, but still he did carry my wifes bag for some parts of the trek when she felt tired. He has a lot of knowledge of the areas around Annapurna Mountins and he was more than happy to share it with us and told us many interesting stories. We had a great time on our trek! We highly recomend Blue Moutins Travel Agency and specially their guide Milan Gurung!
Great cost effective bag storage in Paris. AS ADVERTISED on their website storing a bag with them was easy and a good value. Very good English and French spoken by the owners.

Amazing place to visit. I went to Nepal for Trekking on 9-16 April 2016 by Blue mountain Travels agencyMy guide's name is Milan Gurung.He gave you a good opinion about Trekking and took you to very special hostel to stay during the trip.

Excellent driver named, Akhil, made the trip very exciting and enjoyable. We rented a car from Buddi; after the initial car and costs issues, a driver named Akhil and a Skoda car was assigned to us for six days. We enjoyed the trip to Pokhara, Kathmandu, Chitwan and Nagarkot. It was Akhil, the driver, a 23 years old experienced young mad who made the trip very enjoyable. Akhil, is an excellent driver. He is courteous, anticipates customer needs,is respectful, is always on time, never late. He is knowledgeable and confident; more than happy to help customers, never tells you false stories. He is the best driver I had for a long time. Ask for him by name!!

Trekking. We wanted to do a trekkingtour and Mr. Buddhi gave us a good offer for trekking and a very good guide. Krishna cared a lot about us and for our safety and guided us very good through our trekking tour. Everything was on time and he alway looked for our best. We would always highly recommend Blue Mountain Agency for activities.

annapurna circuit trek. Good agency! We got a young and very energetic guide Krishna. We did part of the circuit going over thorong la pass, amazing experience. Krishna made us feel safe and comfortable, I would definitely recommend it!

ABC Base Camp Trek. This is my 2nd time to use this Agency, last time was 2014 I've been to Poon Hill 5 days trek, this time I went further to Annapurna Base Camp with 7 days trekking.We're group of 4 peoples my local guide Mr.Raj, he is very experienced guide and also a very nice person. All the time of our trekking he took a very good care of us even when we were back in Kathmandu he still stick around and show us the city give us a good tricks and helpful information.If you're looking for a travel agency.We are highly recommended Blue Mountian Travel.

Excellent, Friendly and Highly recommended. We used travel service from this agency for trekking to ABC. The owner, Mr. Buddhi is a very friendly owner that we ever met. Moreover, local guide Mr. Ram is also very nice service. He take care us along the trip even my sister get sick from AMS, he can manage this trip very well. When we back to Kathmandu, Mr. Ram also try to come to meet us even his job is done. In the last day, Mr. Buddhi also give us a warm dinner at his own house. We are highly recommened this travel agency Blue Mountian Travel.

Privatecar. I stayed in Kathmandu for 3 months. When ever I need transportation I reliedon Blue Mountain travel for ground transportation. The cars were late models,clean and well maintained. The drivers were extremely friendly and quiteprofessional. And the cost was quite inexpensive.I used the cars for tours, trips to the office, out of the city, etc. etc..I highly recommend Blue Mountain Travel!!

Excellent service, look no further!. We have used the travel agency of Mr.Buddhi to take care of our short 7 day visit of Nepal. It was only thanks to him that we managed everything we planned in such a short timeframe. He picked us up at the airport, drove to Pokhara, where our guide, Milan Gurung was already waiting. We managed to trek all the way to Annapurna Sanctuary and back, while Milan was giving us valuable information about the Gurung culture and carried some of our stuff along the way. We even forgot our shoes at the Pokhara hotel on the way back and the driver was able to get another driver bring the shoes to Kathmandu in time for our return flight. Before leaving, we were offered a free hot shower, tea and changing room in Mr.Buddhi's Homestay, the service was simply impeccable.

Knowledgeable, Friendly and Helpful people. My major interaction after the initial booking was with the Mr Dipak.He is a very friendly guy who also knows the tips and turns in nepal.Highly recommend to guys looking for a safe and experienced driver.

Excellent services provided by blue mountain. Blue mountain provided decent car and great driver at an economical price. Mr. Deepak Karmacharrya (driver) could speak english, hindi and local language. He drove the car well and was polite and understanding.

Trust these guys, they know what you need!!. From the first day i arrived to Kathmandu Mr. Buddhi and his team at Hotel Happy Home, Blue Mountain Travels&Tours, Mount Fuji Adventure Pvt. Ltd. They were all really helpful to me. They've picked me from the airport, they even paid my visa fee as i didn't have cash on me! Then Mr. Buddhi introduce me to Mr. Yaka Simkhada at the Hotel Happy Home and we've made a trekking plan for 9 days on The Annapurna Circuit. Starting from crazy bus ride from Kathmandu to Pokhara, i had great time;) Then fifth of march we started our trekking adventure with Yaka.After 4 hard days, passing through tight jungle paths, by flowers, by farmer villages on hillsides, by langur monkeys and in between rocky hills, living the four seasons in one day, racing with rain and snow, sweating with sun we've made it to the Annapurna Base Camp (4130m) 8 of march at 15:00 local time. I feel like a professional mountainer because i felt great at an altitude that so many people get sick, with severe headache and high altitude sickness. Only there was snow storm at night and temperatures was down below -15 but next morning the view was amazing.I couldn't make it to 5000m because of the heavy snow night before, these monumental mountains creates their own climate but we made it to 4400m and faced some of the most dangerous mountain peaks on earth. It was a wonderful feeling.Machhapuchhre also called Fish Tail (6997m), Annapurna South(7219m) and most dangerous, deadliest mountain in the world Annapurna First (8091m) We had a lot of fun with my friend Yaka Simkhada singing Nepalese songs. We're one of the best teams ;) now descending, still one day to finish our 9 days of wonderful and difficult adventure.. By the 13 of march we were back in Pokhara.. Overall, i recommend you to trust Mr.Buddhi and guide Yaka Simkhada. They are really professional and helpful. They solve any problem it might take time to solve by yourself. Great experience and wonderful adventure. Please book your trekking trip with Blue Mountain Travels and Mount Fuji Adventure Pvt. Ltd. You won't be disappointed;)I also respect Nepalese People a lot for adapting themselves to the hard life conditions specially in the countryside, they deserve better..Adil AVCI adildenadam@gmail.comBrussels/Belgium, Istanbul/Turkey

Outstanding. Me, my wife and daughter booked the trip (package) Kathmandu-Pokhara-Dhampus-Sarankoat with BlueTravel two weeks ago. It is hard to imagine how helpful, professional and kind Mr Buddhi Basnet was. Perfectly organized trip, all mails answered at once, useful advices and reservations of hotel and ultralight flight made on our behalf in advance. These are the main (not all) topics of Mr Basnet professional and over expectations activity. Our driver was Mr. Deepak, professional, warm and helpful young man. During te trip he showed us many interesting places and explained all details regarding Nepal, it's culture, history etc. I strongly reccommend this company. Eligiusz nad family from Poland.

Professional, Easy Communication. My friends and I booked a trip from Kathmandu to Pokhara via this agency. They were extremely quick at responding and sending someone over to discuss what we wanted out of our trip, price, timing, etc. It was a very smooth setup. The driver we had was very friendly and most importantly, a good, safe driver. We had an excellent trip to and from Pokhara. Definitely recommend!

The best experience and hard to forget!. Mr Buddhi Basnet is the CEO of this company. He is a kindhearted person. He also owned some hotels in Thamel. The price offered by him is the most affordable among the rest. We rent a car from Kathmandu to Pokhara. He is easy to get. Before touching down KTM airport, we chat a lot by Whatsapp and email. We just prepare our itinerary and email him. The driver, Mr Deepak fluent in English and along the journey we are chatting from politics, current issues and everything. Although the journey took 5 hours but we felt shorter than that. The scenery along the trip are fascinating and amazing! Highly recommended!!!

Amazing once in a lifetime must do, and then do again if you can Sunrise flight over Everest and Himalayan range.. Oh wow not much will equal this! Amazing champaign flight with certificate over Everest and Himalayan Mountain range. On the turn at the end of the loop they get the plane so close it leaves you in awe. Blue mountain is so very on top of every detail, and very professional, I would use them again and again without any doubt at all. My hotel was very very hard to find even after Blue Mountain spoke with the owner once the day before and also at 0500 AM the morning of my 05:45 pickup. My great driver was early. He even enlisted help from a local in the dark for help on locating me. Most taxi's have a very tough time as the hotel is tucked way in from main alley. Nothing was left to chance by this company, I was very impressed. I have never been to Nepal before as well I am a single woman alone. Nepal I find very safe. We arrived at the airport with 1 hour to relax have coffee and anticipate my adventure. The flight was smooth as silk, crystal clear, and sunny. One of the pilots was a woman which was so great to see. The service on board was wonderful from the first moment. The flight certificate was personally signed in pen by the pilot. Each person took a turn on the cockpit, which was truly amazing. We each had our own window seat took take photos. This trip was for me a lot of money for 1 activity, only because I am on a 1 year around the world trip. I am so grateful I did it, as I will never forget Valentines 2016 over Everest. Blue Mountain is very highly rated for a good reason they are the best. Thank you from Connie in Surrey BC Canada

Excellent service. I hired a car for four days from Blue Mountain travels, and had a wonderful experience with their service. 10 days trip to Nepal from the 27th of decemeber 015 to the 5th of January 016. we had a "friends trip" and Blue mountain handled all transportation and actually organizing some of the activities. Mardi Himal Trek. Used Blue Mountain Travels for a 6 day Mardi Himal trek. Would highly recommend this tour and guide.

Travel made easy. A day before I left for Nepal, I contacted Mr. Buddhi for a private taxi from Kathmandu to Pokhara. Nepal Trip in March 2015. Me and my wife were planning to visit Nepal in December 2012 and contacted Mr. Buddhi Jung Basnet in October 2012 for the first time. frined in an unknown land. I along with my wife had wonderful few days in Nepal in April'15, thanks to Mr. Budhdhi for his wonderful assistance. Best trek, Nepal. Route finding and getting maps is easy in Nepal, it's finding good places to eat and sleep, communicating with locals and sorting permits etc. that is difficult. Fortunately, on our 1st visit to Kathmandu, we stayed at a great local hotel (the Kathmandu boutique hotel) with links to 'Blue Mountain Travels'. As experienced travelers we are always sceptical about this type of arrangement, especially as there are thousands of 'one man' companies around. But our fears were totally unfounded. Initially we were concerned about our level of fitness and decided on a short foothills trek before more strenuous stuff. Buddhi, the boss at Blue Mountain, couldn't have been more in touch with our needs and tailored the trekking for us - at good prices. Or guide throughout, Bharat, was outstanding, he sorted all the inevitable problems that cropped up and was excellent company. My partner and I can't recommend 'Blue Mountain Travels' highly enough.

Excellent Service in Nepal!. A friend, who went to Nepal, introduced me to Buddhi. I was helping my brother and his friends to arrange their trekking packages to Everest Base Camp. I felt responsible to them because I supposed to join but unfortunatelly i had to prepare my wedding. So, i emailed Buddhi and asked many things regarding his trekking packages. With quick respons, patiently he answered my questions. I booked trekking to Everest Base Camp for 3 people with Buddhi and got special prices! (Hehe)When my brother arrived in Nepal, Buddhi picked them up at the airport even though they didn't sleep in his hotel. He also helped them to issue trekking insurances since I couldn't find any insurance that covers helicopter rescue in Indonesia. Thanks God, he did that because one of my brother friends got AMS in Loubuche and need to be evacuated by helicopter. I was so glad that Buddhi took care them very well. I couldn't say more about that, please keep up your good work! And thank you for everything, hopefully we could meet soon.Christina, Indonesia.

Annapurna Base Camp trek. Blue Mountain Travel has once again provided me with an excellent trekking adventure. If it's adventure you seek with due considerations for safety and maximization of enjoyment, there is no better tour company available in Kathmandu! Best affordable rate with premium service. We (family of 2 adults and 3 children age between 8 till 12 years old) travelled to Nepal from Feb 17th till 24th 2015. After searching thoroughly in the internet for good reliable ground transport and informative helping hand from fellow travellers in Tripadvisor's comment, we decided to go with Blue Mountain Travels. We made the right decision after all. Mr Buddhi corresponded with aplomb and assure us of his competitive rate among other transport companies which he did. He assigned a warmth and friendly chauffeur - Mr Prakesh to welcome us at airport and he became our travelling companion for sight seeing throughout our stay at Thamel, Pokhara and Nagarkot before dropping us off at airport at the end of 8th day. We graciously thank Mr Buddhi for providing a good reliable and comfy jeep; Mr Prakesh for a superb tour guide cum family member to us. He is a quick companion to my kids, show us attractive places for sight seeing, explaining the local culture, punctual for pick up, patiently waited for us whilst we spent hours taking photos and shopping, his caring to the jeep cleanliness and foremost our wellfare during the trip. I would highly recommend Blue Mountain Travels , drop an email to Mr Buddhi and dont forget to get Mr Prakesh as chauffeur whenever any traveller decides to travel in Nepal with ease of mind. We truly enjoy our holidays in Nepal !!! Thanks again to Mr Buddhi's Blue Mountain Travels. Cheers.

Likely the Best Thing I Have Ever Done, Everest Flight!. I reached out to several companies prior to our trip to Kathmandu and I received a response from two of them. Buddhi at Blue Mountain was the most engaging and offered what appeared to be the best service.Prior to arriving, we agreed on a helicopter flight from Kathmandu Airport which would take us to one of the villages beyond Lukla and then up to see Everest and back. The morning after we landed, we met with Buddhi and finalised the details and the following morning, weather permitting we would be on our way.Right on schedule, we met Buddhi and went to his office next door to pay the bill and he led us to the airport we were met a representative for the airline. The escorted us through the terminal (we still had to go through all the security procedures) and made it to the office where we met the Captain (Captain Andy). By the way, the domestic terminal where we waited was a zoo!They took our weights, and decided that we did not need to stop in Lukla. Our routing was direct to the Everest View Hotel (the highest hotel in the world it's claimed--hard to argue). It was a very smoggy morning and we did not see much until we cleared Kathmandu city.Captain Andy was the pilot monitoring and First Officer Raj was the pilot flying. We felt very safe the whole time which meant we could enjoy the views.What an amazing experience. About halfway the mountains came into view and the haze had disappeared. Below the countryside is dotted with agricultural minded villages and eventually we reached Lukla which we overflew to get EVH. We spent an hour at the hotel before flying back. On the flight back, we flew up a bit more and got a little closer to Everest before turning back to Kathmandu. I would highly recommend having tea or coffee (no milk). I had the hot chocolate and as it was the only item which I had different from my wife, and I was terribly ill the next day.It was amazing!!! I have not done anything like this, and while it was not cheap, it was so worth it.Another cool thing is that you can listen to the air traffic control as that is the only way to communicate with the pilots who are also the tour guides.Buddhi did great as our arranger, and I could not think of anything that could have been done differently. He also arranged with our driver to stop at Boudanath Temple on the way back from the airport which the driver did, no problem.Another reason to appreciate Buddhi, is that the next day I was quite sick and went to look for a pharmacy. I happened to run into Buddhi who walked me to a pharmacy--incredibly grateful.I would highly recommend Blue Mountain Travels--it may not be the cheapest, but I would attest that it is a solid service. No complaints!

Very good service. Pramod & KarinWe rented a car with driver for going from Kathmandu to Pokhara . Blue Mountain Home stay. We visited Nepal for 15 days. We spent the first nights in Kathmandu at Blue Mountain Home Stay. Very friendly staff, heater and hot water. Good Service. We used transport service from Mr. Buddi in October 2014 for 8 days in Kathmandu, Nagorkot and Pokhara.The vehicle used in Kathmandu and Nagorkot (same one) was new and the driver was very polite and helpful. As per rule, the same transport could not be used in pokhara and we used 2 cars in 2 days. Out of those, one was not up to mark. Later we came to know from Mr. Buddi that they have to rely on sister companies in pokhara and not totally in their control.In the last day Mr. Buddhi personally came to see us. It was nice meeting him.In total it was a great experience and service. I would 100% recommend this to other travellers as well.

Nepal Driving Tour. We used Blue Mountain to provide car and driver for our week-long stay in Nepal. Everything went very smoothly from agreeing the itinerary to being picked up at the airport and spending a great week in this exceptional country. Having comparison shopped, Blue Mountain's rates for the week were very reasonable with no hidden extras, a new 4wd as promised and an excellent driver in Prakesh.

The best tour experience we have ever had . . . .. We visited Nepal in early October and stayed in Kathmandu for 2 days, Pokhara for 4 days and Nagorkote for a day. Mr. Buddhi and his team arranged all necessary transportation and accommodation for us. We stayed in Blue Mountain Home Stay, which is better than any 5* hotel. Our hotel in Pokhara and Nagorkote was also nice. We really appreciate the way Mr. Buddhi took care of our trip and thank him from the core of our heart.

Got us home safely.. We used Blue Mountain Travels car hire for a journey from Kathmandu to Chitwan, Pokhara, Bandipur and back to KTM.Our driver spoke good English and the 7 seater jeep was as comfortable as we could hope for with 4 adults and a week's worth of luggage.Throughout the journey our diver drove very aggressively which I acknowledge is symptomatic of driving on Nepali roads. However, on more than one occasion this seemed to err more on the side of recklessness.While we were in Pokhara we were offered a sight seeing tour and asked what time we would like for it to start and we chose 9:30. Due to Dashain a driver arrived and asked us if we would mind postponing it until midday so that our driver would be able to visit his family and receive a tikka - we were more than happy for this. However, when (a different) driver arrived for our tour he drove us around to the sights of Pokhara without a word of what we were seeing; if it hadn't been for an Indian family also on the tour telling us why we were stopping in each place we wouldn't have know where or why we were there.For our journey home from Bandipur our driver expressed to us his desire to get back to KTM for a family gathering that evening and we felt guilty requesting that we left at 10am. Knowing that our driver we keen to get back home we were ready to leave promptly only for our driver to call us and say that he was running an hour late, this ended up being and hour 45 late.

"Good service and great time in Nepal". My sister and me traveled to Nepal early June. We enquired the car rental service of Mr Buddhi and his team for our trip around a few cities in Nepal. His quotation was the cheapest and the car that we traveled in are all in good condition. Even though the hours that we traveled were quite long, Mr Buddhi and his team was very nice and did not charged us for the extra hours. In addition, Mr Buddhi and his team are very friendly and always ready to answer to our questions. Will definitely contact Mr Buddhi again on my next visit to Nepal and recommend his service to all my friends.

From the time we arrived at the airport and during our stay BMT looked after us and we had a great time. M Stewart. From the time we arrived at the airport Blue Mountain Travel took care of us and we really enjoyed our traveling in Nepal. Thanks for making our trip so memorable.

Our good time in Nepal :). We asked Mr. Buddhi to arrange the trekking trip to Poon Hill for 5-6 days and everything is great! we really enjoys our trip there. Excellent guide (Mr. Ram), nice porter, good accommodation, good food :)We plan to go Nepal again next year for EBC and will definitely contact Mr. Buddhi to arrange for our trip!

Great service. I booked a car from India for Kathmandu city tour. The rate was cheapest. The car condition was excellent. The driver was great and smiling person. Overall very good. Keep it up. I will recommend to everybody.

Nepal, What great people. My friend and I spent 11 days in Nepal, May of 2014.Our experience with Blue Mountain Travel was excellent.We came over the land border from Tibet so we were very happy to see their representative at the border when we walked across, a very hectic scene. From that time until 11 days later when our driver dropped us at KTH everything was as promised, even better. We drove to Pokhara and Chitwan and back to Kathmandu with no problems, once you get used to Nepal traffic.I highly recommend them to anyone that is planning on visiting Nepal.

Good service!. In March this year we booked a porter-guide via this travel agency for the Lantang & Gosainkund trekking and because we were really happy with our porter-guide (Thakur, who knew the way very well and speaks English!) we decided to book our second trekking (EBC) also with Blue Mountain Travels. With so many travel agencies in Thamel, it might be hard to choose one, but this one is trustworthy and we are sure you won't regret doing business with this one!

Pleasure trip to Nepal. me n my wife visited Nepal during third week of may 2014. All credit goes to Mr Buddhi and his team for their excellent services, It was so well planned that we could cover most of Nepal in a very short period. Mr Buddhi.O P MandhanaIndore, India

Very impression from excellent service. I contacted with Mr.Buddhi,Blue mountain travel's manager many times by email to organize for my group, 21 persons. The best reason that made me choose Mr.Buddhi and his company was his honesty and sincerity, I did not pay any money after we had agreement. If you are looking for some travel agencies in Nepal I recommend Blue mountain travels, you can trust him. Confirm !!

Very good quality of service... I strongly suggest all the travellers going to nepal to book their holidays with blue mountain travels.The director of the company mr.buddhi is a wonderful man who takes personal care of his guests though he is so busy.Even sitting in ahmedabad with out giving a single ruppee i have planned my holidays with mr.buddhi.and i am sure only this company can put such trust to its guests.The staff of the company and drivers are also very carrying as well.I strongly recommend this travel company for touring in nepal.

Everything organised for you. I went to Nepal on my own and was feeling very very lost at the airport. Mr Buddhi asked if I needed help, and even though he was waiting for other guests, he went out of his way to help me before they arrived. My hotel room was booked, but nothing else, so he assisted in getting me to my hotel and then everything else for my entire trip. He didn't push anything on me like some travel agents, he simply asked what I was interested in and once I had decided what I wanted, he tailored my entire to stay to exactly what I wanted. Each day trip, hotel, car transportation, travel expense - everything was organised, as well as amazing Nepalese hospitality from both Mr Buddhi and his staff. If you want to feel safe and organised, contact Mr Buddhi. If you want adventure and "off the beaten track", contact Buddhi. Seriously, if you want it, he can help you.
Perfect service. I booked a bungeejump with travel agency. Mr. Buddhi arranged everything perfectly. He was also so generous to give Me the small discount he recieved from the company for booked it.

A Great Experience. Exzellent experience for the flight itself and orther Services. Booking flights, Hotels and Tours has been an easy and comfortable experience, very friendly service, competent advise and even when rebooking a hotel things werde handled professionally and efficiently. To be highly rekommanded!

Excellent service by Blue Mountain Travels. It was our first visit to Kathmandu(Nepal).. Me and my wife were very excited to be in the land that we have been dreaming since many years.. The country, her people, Himalayas, local food, everything was amazing.. But the most impressing experience we had after our 5 days stay, was the excellent guidence service and sincere friendship offered by Mr.Buddhi and his travel agency Blue Mountain Travels.. We highly recommend anyone planning to visit Nepal to contact directly with this company.. You will love it..

Mr. Buddhi,the best.. Our travel throughout west Nepal by car was arranged by Mr Buddhi.It was 13 days trip covering Kathmandu,Pokhara,Lumbini,Chitwan National Park including Nagarkot.Our mountain flight to view MT.Everest was also arranged by Mr.Buddhi.It was perfect and the driver Mr.Rajan was good and experienced.Our journey was made wounderful.Looking forward to our next trip.

Best Experience in Nepal. It was my first visit to Nepal with my parents and Family...initially i though that it would be costly affair... but with Mr. Buddhi the trip to Nepal was excellent and within budget with best hotels in towns( Yak n Yeti in Kathmandu, Temple Tree in Pokhara..& Park Land in Chitwan)....we stayed in Kathmandu, Pokhara & Chitwan Park...whenever we have any query Mr. Buddhi was just a call away and when required he comes to met also, he is very kind with genuine and rates provided by him is also best he provides the best excursion plans for all types...Stay in Chitwan was also very well planned and it was memorable one.Rental Car by Mr. Buddhi was also nice and staff member was also very gentle..thanks for this wonderful experience dear buddhi ji....will look forward to come again and will try to explore some other parts of nepal soon.

Unforgettable Experience and Best Driver. After checking online for many days, We decided to book the cab from Blue Mountain Travels (Mr Budhhi) as he quoted a very reasonable price for 4 day (14 Mar - 17 Mar) tour in Nepal (Kathmandu and Pokhra). Our driver (Prakash Joshi) was very professional... Knew all the routes very well... had great sense of humor and command over Hindi, Nepali and English language. Excellent Service Provider - Mr. Buddhi. We booked the cab from Blue Mountain Travels for four days from 14-Mar-2014 to 17-Mar-2014. Driver Prakash Joshi, who has full command over English, Hindi and Nepali, had a great sense of humor and was eager to show as much of Nepal as he can. Excellent Mountain Flight experience. Mr Buddhi and his team helped us to book Everest Mountain flights during our stay in Kathmandu. He provided us with full infotmation on our options and booked out preferred flight at a discount. He also provided transportation for us (and tea and fruit before the early flight!). The flight itself was fantastic - a once in a lift time opportunity! We travelled with Buddha Air as they had the best reputation and were not disappointed - every passenger had a window seat, and the opportunity to visit the cockpit for an even better view. And we even returned to the homestay (which Mr Buddhi also runs!) to a fantastic breakfast! Thanks Mr Buddhi!Tip: Take the first flight of the day to get clearest skies and avoid delays at the airport - there are several flights per hour that take the same trip so delays are common.

Unforgettable experience. We had a wonderful time during 14-20 JAN in Nepal. BLue Mountain Travel provided us a car rental with a professional driver who has a safety service and good guidance for the tourist spots.More than words to thank you Mr.Buddhi and his team for the excellent hospitality services during my stay in Nepal.Strongly recommend to take a services for this agent,also worth for your money.

Excellent Van Rental Service!. We have just came back from Nepal in January 2014, and during our 8 days trip in Nepal, we have took Van rental with driver service from Blue Mountain Travels-Private Mountain Flight Day Tours, the boss of this company, Mr.Buddhi and his driver, Mr.Krishna Tamang has provided us great service during our tour in Nepal. We have been greeted personally by both of them on arrival to Kathmandu Airport, and then Mr.Buddhi has fulfilled all the things we demanded for our sightseeing. He has gave us his professional service and valuable opinions on the travel arrangements. The car that we use is the toyota hi-ace van, and it's a new, clean and comfort car for 10 of us. It has large space for our luggages as well, so that we can move from one place to another easily during our tour. Mr.Krishna drive safely throughout our journey, he's polite, always comes 10 minutes earlier that the promised departure times each day-which is perfect, and well spoken in english, so we don't have much problems in communications with him. Thanks to Mr.Buddhi and Mr.Krishna, because of your excellent service, we've had a wonderful and unforgettable journey in Nepal!

Great Service by Mr Buddhi & His Team. This was the 2nd time we booked a transport service from Mr Buddhi and his team. The Hiace Ace Van was very well maintained throughout the 2 weeks. Wounderful trekking. I did a trekking tour with Blue Mountain Travels to the Gosainkund lake, the holy lakes. It was really wounderful and fantastic. Perfect Ground Handling. Visited Nepal 18-21 Dec 13, I sourced the details of Blue Mountain travels online and prices are much comepitive compared to others, so decided to try the services.All services were executed perfectly and on-time. The car was OK, but the driver cum guide Mr. Krishna was good and informative and very hospitable. Mr. Budhi, the director of the company was very supportive and heard every detail of our itinerary and made all arrangement well without any complaints.For all kind of travellers, I recommend Blue Mountain travels as a reliable ground handler.

Excellent Service. .We visited Nepal for the first time at the end of September for 8 days. Before leaving Australia I checked on the website for car hire options I contacted a few, one being Blue Mountain Travels. Within a short time I got an e mail acknowledging my e mail & from then on one of the owners, Buddhi Basnet, was reliable in getting back to us. On our arrival in Kathmandu, Buddhi was there to greet us at the airport and he also managed currency change for us which was extremely helpful. We were provided with a Toyota car which was clean & reliable. Our driver, Shankar is also to be highly recommmended. Not only was he a good driver but he was always on time to pick us up from our hotel for day excursions & even accompanied us on a few occasions as a guide when we visited a few sites which was very helpful. Even though we had prepared a draft itinerary on what we wanted to see, Buddhi was very flexible if we wanted to see some other attractions which were on the way. We were also able to use the driver to take us for dinner and drop us off at the hotel every evening which was very useful as we were strict vegetarians and so restricted where we could eat.We are extremly satisfied with the service and would strongly recommend Blue Mountain Travels as the choice for car hire & planning your trip to Nepal.Visitors from Australia

Great service....always with a smile. Recently we booked with Buddhi as were staying at his guesthouse. He organised our TIMs, bus tickets to Pokhara and our lovely porter, Lama for our 12 day trek to Annapurna Base Camp. All went very smoothly and we had an excellent time. We would recommend Mr Buddi and his team to anyone who wants a hassle free trip.

Life Savers. Deepak, Sonica, and Buddhi helped make my trip to Nepal an outstanding adventure as well as helping to potentially save my life. I spent the first three days of the trip guided by Deepak and Sonica, who quickly became very good friends to me. Their willingness to help, level of knowledge, and openness were amazing. Deepak consistently went above and beyond in order to help me and a friend of mine get what we needed to make our trip was successful. Sonica was a wonderful guide who taught me a lot about her culture in a fun manner. Buddhi has a very nice organization and his family was very hospitable during my stay. So how are they life savers.... About a week before my flight home, I began to feel sick, but decided to try to stick it out. When it became obvious to me that I needed to see a doctor, I didn't hesitate to call Depaak and knew that he would be willing and able to take care of everything I needed logistically. His response on the phone was reassuring and comforting. After a three hour ride back to Kathmandu, I met Deepak at his office. He then helped me with my gear, the hotel, and getting me to the hospital. He stayed three hours until I was admitted, then came every day to check on me, and even came to pick me up when I was released. When I noted my appreciation of his kindness, he responded you are family and this is what we do for family. I was deeply touched by this and it has impacted how I value and relate to people. I ended up having a temperature of 106, advanced typhoid fever, and was in the hospital for four days. If it had not been for Deepak, I would not have known what hospital to have gone to, might not have got the care that I needed, and would have felt very alone. All of this aside, I would still be giving Blue Mountain Travels and their staff a 5 star rating because of the quality of service. I highly recommend using there services and trusting that you will be well taken care of. Many, many thanks! David

Excellent service - excellent value for money !. We rent a car with driver for going from Kathmandu to Pokhara and return, plus occasional trips during our time in Pokhara. Afterwards we rented it again for a day trip to Bhaktapur and Nagarkot. The car was very comfortable, the driver spoke very well English and was driving safely. On the ways he spotted us some places worth seeing. We needed some other stuff arranged for our Nepal Trip and Mr. Buddhi did every effort to fulfill the requirements to our fullest satisfaction. That's why we highly recommend the services of Mr. Buddhi and his company "Blue Montain Travels".His slogan is "Your happiness is our property" ... definitely this is not an empty saying; ... it is true !

Top notich service, excellent communications!. We used services of Blue Mountain Travels for our 17 day tour of Nepal. Buddhiji was extremely helpful and provided us with a Toyota Van, very good hotels in all the destinations. Excellent communication, always prompt and clear.Invaluable tips and suggestions as we were in Nepal for the first time. Highly recommended!

Excellent service. We have taken a car for 4 days from mr buddhi and we got 2011 model tip top tata manza. The car was very good maintained and driver prakash is a excellent person.he is not only a good driver but also a good guide.he jas accompined us to take us various places. We are extremly satisfied with the service and strongly recommend blue mountain for our friends who is willing to visit nepal.

Back to real friends. It was my second visit to Nepal with these special folks from Blue Mountain Travel and as always they did a great job.We visit the Chitwan national park, Pokhara and trekking at the end and it was perfect. Thank you very much Gentleman

Historical,Beautiful and Simple Nepal. My recent visit to this historical & beautiful mountain kingdom was a memorable one. I had the opportunity to visit one of the most sacred places there, i.e. the Lumbini where the birth place of Lord Buddha. Exiting one was the plane trip over the Everest just at dawn. There were a number of other attractions, country side and places of importance, including the place of the "Kumari" that I have visited and enjoyed/experienced. All that were done in 4 days and that would not have been possible without the help of Blue Mountain Travels who took care of everything for me very professionally. From the time I have landed and until my depature, it was the Blue Mountain;s guidance that I followed, particularly its owner Buddhi Basnet who lookedafter its clients personnaly in addition to its well experienced guides and I have no hesitation to recomment them to anyone visiting Nepal.

Car and driver hire for Kathmandu to Pokhara. I sent an email in late July asking for a quote and they got back to me within an hour with a competitive price for a return car trip Kathmandu to Pokhara. They quickly accommodated our requests to pay in a different currency and stop off for two hours on the way with absolutely no fuss. Both the organiser Buddhi and the driver Prakesh were enthusiastic and fun, we really enjoyed what could otherwise have been a very dull couple of day's driving. I kept their number for the next time I visit Kathmandu and need a car, and I won't be bothering to call anyone else.

Excellent Tour agency. Blue Mountain travels arranged our Chitwan and Pokhara tours, their drivers were friendly and helpful. I really enjoyed my holiday in Nepal and if I visit again I would definately use Blue Mountain tours. Nepal is truly a very special country.

Good experience in Nepal, thank you Buddhi. I had the opportunity to make a short trip to Nepal in late June, while travelling from Hong Kong to Mumbai. Having made the trip on short notice, I really hadn’t fully planned the visit. I met Buddhi Basnet at the airport, and he was able to help me with the Everest flight, and also with a tour of the city. He arranged for the next morning sightseeing flight to Everest, and then when the flight turned back because of low visibility, he arranged for the flight the next day. For the tour of the sites in Kathmandu, he arranged for one of his drivers Dipak to take me around the city. Dipak was a very good guide, and was extremely helpful as he took me to some shops to get replacement items as my luggage was lost going into Kathmandu. Buddhi even offered to help me later to locate my luggage at the airport, as I was only there for three days. Overall it was a good experience with Blue Mountain Travel, and when I return I will definitely contact Buddhi.Paul, Kentucky, USA

Great Honeymoon experience..!!. We had planned our unusual honeymoon destination to be Nepal. The trip was made truly memorable because of the well planned itenary by Mr. Buddhi from Blue Mountain Travels. He was truly courteous and planned everything for us from our hotel pick up and drop - trip across kathmandu, chitwan & pokhra - booking of our choice of hotel in each of the destinations - even managed currency change for us. Anyone travelling to Nepal, I highly recommend them to plan out your stay and travel through Blue Mountain, they truly personalize your itenary and all you need to do is sit back and enjoy!!! Cheers!

Very good and impressive trip, highly recommended. We have travel with Blue Mountains for 4 days in Nepal. Mr Buddhi well managed our trip and recommend a good accomodation for us. Within our limited time in holiday, Buddhi can manage us to sightseeing many places in Nepal including Kathmandu and Pokhara. For the car trip service, it is a pretty nice and impressive experience. Our drivers (Mr Buddhi had provided 2 drivers along our trip) are very good and take care us very well (there is an old lady in our trip and our driver takes care here very well). It is pretty nice. We have ever travel and have trip in more than 30 countries but we have never get the perfect like this. We highly recommend using the service from Blue Mountains if you plan to visit Nepal.Somsri

nice Trip!. Had a car and driver a whole day for a trip to pashupatinath and nagarkot. Car was in excellent condition, the driver was very friendly and spoke good english.Price was very low :-)Mr. Buddhi perfectly organized that trip!!

Amazing organization, awesome trek. I was approached by Krishna, the owner of Ammonite, on the streets of Thamel and immediately waved him off, thinking he was just another touter. Upon checking out his organization on Trip Advisor, however, it was evident that Ammonite was a promising organization with which to embark on a Himalayan trek-- especially after we shopped around and found that Ammonite offered the same trek (a 10-day trek to Mardi Himal and Ghorapani/Poon Hill area) for much cheaper than many other organizations quoted us: $485 per person including everything except water and coffee versus $650 to $750). We were so, so glad that we opted to go with Ammonite as we found them to be genuinely wonderful people. We hung out with Krishna and his staff in Kathmandu both before and after our trek. Before our trek they graciously hosted a birthday party for my sister in their office (cake, candles and all!), and after the trek took us to their favorite local restaurant one day and a fun live music venue the next. They were so fun, and Krishna's constant response of "Sure, why not?" soon became a catch phrase of our time in Nepal.The trek itself was excellent, with a well-planned (but adjustable) itinerary that took us through sublime areas of the Himalayas. All of our accommodation was good, certainly good enough for us. Unfortunately we didn't have the greatest weather and missed out on several prime viewpoints due to all-encompassing fog, something that we weren't expecting given that October is known to be clear. (Though we embarked in very early October.)Our guide Pasang was the highlight of our entire 5-week trip to Nepal. He was hilarious, knowledgable, and went above and beyond to ensure that we were content and safe. My sister had some knee trouble in some of the steeper sections of Mardi Himal, and Pasang was patient and incredibly helpful in assisting her down many of the ledges. He's unwaveringly positive and incredibly loquacious, as he's eager to strike up a conversation with anyone, foreigner or local, whom he comes across. As a former chef, Pasang knows his way around a kitchen and would help out at all the restaurants and guest houses we went to, ensuring our food was cooked to perfection. In the evenings, we spent a great deal of time drinking raski, laughing, and talking about Nepal. My sister and I experienced some major post-trek depression when we had to part ways with Pasang. He's truly a gem, and we can't recommend him enough! Clearly, I can't say enough good things about this organization. If you're looking for a good organization in Kathmandu, this is it!

Great experience trekking. We trekked Annapurna base camp via poon Hill with Santosh as our guide. He was a terrific guide that knew about all the details about the mountains we were trekking through, a well educated man. He was a master manager, always booking guest houses for us with the best view. Ontop of this, he genuinely cared for us throughout the trek, always asking us how we were coping and accommodating for all skill levels. Truly remarkable views on this trek. I would highly recommend this trekking route, Ammonite as a trekking company and Santosh as a guide and friend!!

Trek to Poon hill and Anapurna base camp. Had an incredible experience with Ammonite! We hiked with a large group of friends to Poon hill and Anapurna base camp and everything was organised perfectly. Our guide San Tosh was exceptional, very adaptable and knowledgeable about the area. Kai pai cant wait to plan the next adventure with these guys!

Great company. We were greeted by Krishna in the street and my brother and I decided to go with to his office and see what prices he had compared to other agencies. We're glad we did. We got a great price for the gosai kunda trek and had a great guide, Suneel, who made our trek even better. The guys at ammonite are real nice and genuine guys and you can't go wrong with them.

Awesome trek with amazing guide!!!. A group of 9 of us organised to trek for 10 days to Annapurna base camp. Our guide Santosh was an absolutely incredible guide along with Bishal our assistant guide/porter and Gorey our porter. All three always had a huge smile and were cheerful and happy which made the experience even more worthwhile. Santosh had fantastic knowledge of the region and was going above and beyond to make sure we were happy and enjoying ourselves. Overall the experience was unforgettable due the incredible landscape and amazing team. Santosh, Bishal & Gorey were not just our guides/porters by the end but our friends too. Thank you all from Ammonite.

Fun adventures. Rajeesh and his assistants at Ammonite Adventure helped my solo stay in Nepal to be fun and adventurous. He's a really goofy, happy, guy and he and his co-workers make every effort to assure their clients get exactly what they're looking for in an excursion/adventure . I booked two trips through them and both were safe, fun, and well organized! I would highly recommend using them for all your travel needs while in Nepal!

A++ and highly recommended!!. We chose Ammonite Trekking from Trip Advisor reviews for a 10 day trek to Ghorepani/Poon Hill and Annapurna Base Camp and couldn't recommend them more. Brilliant all the way! Krishna was very professional all round. Everything was organised efficiently and always with a smile! Biggest recommendation was our guide Santosh!! What a guide and an asset to the company. An amazing, gracious, honest and respectful young man who became our friend and like part of our family. Our 2 boys 19 & 21 and their 2 mates have made a true friend in Santosh. We made a few changes with our trekking and Santosh was always there willing and able to help us and handled it all very professionally. He booked us in to accomodation with amazing views. We had 3 porters between 9 of us and they amazed us all along the way with their strength! Bassil (i think that's how it's spelt!) & Gorey are a great team with Santosh. Lots of fun and laughs along the way. If you want a truly memorable adventure go with this company!!

Above and Beyond Our Expectations. My brother and I did a 10-day trek to Mardi Himal, Ghorepani, Poon Hill, etc. that was absolutely wonderful. Mr. Krishna coordinated our trip and was very thorough and helpful during the preparation. My birthday was the day before we left and he put together a celebration in his office, it was so sweet! Mr. Pasang was our guide and he was outstanding. Not only did he make sure we were informed, safe, comfortable, and taken care of at all times, but he always had us laughing and smiling! The three of us had an amazing time together, we will certainly request him as our guide for future treks. The views were breath-taking, the journey was incredible, but it was Mr. Pasang that made the experience so memorable. Both Mr. Pasang and Mr. Krishna went above and beyond our expectations, thank you so much!!

Great Trek, great company. I had already seen good reviews for ammonite on tripadvisor before visiting Nepal so I tried them first. I told them I had 8 days and asked for advice on what trek would be best for my timeframe. They advised I do the langtang valley and it turned out to be a great desision. From the off they were very clear about what the price for my trek included and didn't include, so I knew exactly what to expect. My guide was great and now consider him a good friend. Cheaper than if I had booked the same thing through a UK company without a doubt. I plan on returning to Nepal as 2 weeks just isn't enough, and I will definitely use Ammonite again.

16 day EBC & Cho La Pass. I was absolutely pleased with my trek my guide Saran was the BEST and has all the experience and knowledge,he was So helpful and was always looking out for me !!! I Highly recommend him and the agency Kris was checking up on me making sure all was good....It's been an unforgettable trek that I'll carry with me for life.

4 day trek to Poon Hill - Highly Recommended . Krishna of Ammonite Adventure approached us on the street in Thamel and although we are usually very skeptical about that sort of thing, Krishna was different due to his charming, friendly and non-pushing attitude.
