All the parts of our trip were organised by Dolakh and his team, this included sightseeing in the Kathmandu valley, our trip to ABC and some post trek R&R in Pokara and a couple of nights in the very nice Yak & Yeti hotel in Kathmandu, it also including a flight to the top the world to see Mount Everest and the Himalaya. Although the extra bits were brilliant the main reason for our visit was to trek to Annapurna and this was made possible with the support of our guides and porters who were AWESOME. Cannot thank Tilakh and his assistant Guness for all their support and encouragement on the trip and also for their patience as we took photo after photo for 10 days.We also had a late request of Dolakh to organise a 60th birthday party at short notice on our return to Kathmandu, Mountain Mart organised the venue (K Too steakhouse) and the birthday cake etc. a memorable evening was had by all, Willie (the birthday boy) could not believe it when probably the finest chocolate birthday cake I have ever tasted was brought out after dinner. Superb.If you are considering a trekking holiday in Nepal just contact Mountain Mart Treks & Expedition and let Dolakh organise it all, before he hands you over to Tilakh for what will be the trip of a lifetime.

Reliablie Agent for Langtang Valley trek. We are a group of 2 from Singapore and did 8D7N Langtang Valley trek with this travel agent in late December 2014. Their package are transparent with little additional charges along the trekking unless you want to charge your electronics or consume bottled drink. We used Jeep transportation to trek starting point. The Jeep is in good condition and pick up are on time. For lodges along the trek, we had 2 nigh with gas fired shower which provides stable hot water.(Solar power shower is not stable in Winter times) At locations without gas fired shower, boiled water and shower bag were provided free of charge. Some minor concerns: Food safety along this rout is not so good,though this has nothing to do with the travel agent. It is advised to bring some medicine for stomach problemsThe Guide are equip with good shoes for snow, however, the porter wore a sneaker and will have problem if walk in deep snow for consecutive days.

Everest Base Camp - Incredible experience. We booked our base camp trek through mountain mart after seeing all the positive reviews on tripadvisor and this turned out to be a fantastic decision. Dolakh was an absolute pleasure to deal with and was quick to answer any questions we had about the trek. The trek itself was an amazing experience and a special mention goes to our guide Bodri who looked after us and ensured that we knew what was ok to eat and drink and made sure we took our time getting up the mountain. With his help and our amazing (and funny) porters we were able to make it to base camp without succumbing to altitude sickness like other groups we encountered on the way up. The jackets provided were excellent quality and the included food was more than you'll need on your trip. All in all the next time I book a trek in Nepal I'll be doing it through Mountain mart.

Annapurna Base Camp Trip of a lifetime all my dreams fulfilled and more A++++++. Thanks must go to our wonderful guide Tilakh and his assistant Guness for there support, advice, encouragement and effort to please our party of 12 walkers ( Nivens Eleven). I did a lot of research into reputable tour companies for this lifetime ambition and chose Mountain Mart based on there recommendations on Trip Advisor and there qualifications. Dolakh was on hand from day one of my initial enquires answering all queries and giving advice were required and giving me peace of mind. I had dreamt about this experience for 12 years and it truly was an emotional and rewarding journey. Equipment supplied was of good quality and some of the talker people in our group required larger jacket / sleeping bags and this was addressed. Our every need was catered for and the tea houses ( lodges) flushing toilets were of a very good standard and the food was very good (Dal Bat recommended). We enjoyed the company of both guides and the 6 porters assisting with our kit who tended to stay with the group and assist with directions, tea stops etc when required. Tilakh worked hard at ensuring we were well looked after and that was reciprocated with a wee dram (malt whisky) at night time when we had a night cap. The Lakeside Retreat in Pokhara was a great hotel and worth the swap of return flight for land journey which was a fantastic experience to see more of the culture and will live long in the memory of many in the group. On our return to Kathmandu Dolakh was very hospitable and took us to the K2 Restuarant for dinner that evening. If you are thinking about a trip in Nepal, we did the ABC, then I would have no hesitation in booking Mountain Mart and being in the trustyhands of Dolakh and Tilakh, you will be glad you took the advice...

Poon hill trek 22-27 December. I would like to thank our guide, Prem, and our enthusiastic porter, Krishna, for a wonderful trekking trip. The both of them ensured that my group (4 girls) were well taken of. In fact, we were spoilt! We were able to order anything we wanted off the menu, and our belongings were always transported to our lodge room. Our welfare was well taken care of, with snacks and water provided along the way. They always ensured that we were happy, and that we would trek safely - the route was slippery and our porter provided us with support -- even whilst carrying all that weight! One thing I'd like to highlight is that the employees seemed really happy to be working for Mr Dolakh, which I feel is a really salient and important point. With a great boss, they would do their best and provide the best service to the customers. I had an amazing trip with them and I would go back again. :)

EBC Dec 2014. Such an amazing experience! Mountain Mart were a fantastic choice. Our guide Bodri was excellent - he customised the trip according to the weather conditions and we actually made it to base camp despite many groups heading back because of the snow. All food was included in the trip price, and there was plenty of it. The quality of the hired sleeping bag and down jacket was great. I would recommend doing base camp in December, there were hardly any other people trekking so at times we had the track all to ourselves. It is freezing at night (I think the coldest was about -30), but very pleasant during the day (we only had to wear a fleece jumper). If you're planning on doing EBC, definitely go with mountain mart!

Annapurna base camp. I would like to say a huge thank you to Tilak and to Ginas . Sorry I cannot spell his name. .you were both very helpful to me on my trek. Especially when I struggled a bit. You were both very patient and showed real concern and I could not have asked for better companions. I would highly recommend Mountain Mart. The trip was well thought out and everything went according to plan in spite of the Pan Asia conference in Kathmandu Namaste. My friendsAlan Anderson.

Everest Base Camp Trek November 2014. Am still on a high after an absolutely amazing trek to EBC, and not least so because of Dolakh of Mountain Mart Treks having organized everything, including my guide/porter Khem, Siva who fetched and carried from airport to hotel to airport, and all the wonderful people at the lodges along the way to EBC! Thanks so much for making a dream unforgettable, Dolakh, all arrangements were outstanding and my guide/porter excellent!

4 Day Poon Hill trek. So the 5 of us decided to climb the 3210m Poon Hill from 5-8 December 2014. We went with Mountain Mart because it was the only tour operator we can find on the internet which offered the shortest trek up a Himalayan mountain. The price tag of USD380 per person which included transfers, meals and accommodation was also another attraction. We were not expecting much due to the low price tag, however 5-star service we received was a pleasant surprise. First of all, the company upgraded our land transfer from Kathmandu to Pokhara to a domestic flight without additional cost. The flight gave us an aerial view of the mountains and avoided a repeat experience of the return leg by land where we journeyed through mountain roads, busy towns and river crossings. For that, we were provided with a 7 seater Japanese MPV which made the 6-hour drive back to Pokhara a comfortable one. Our trek was accompanied by a guide, Prem Thapa and 2 porters, Ganesh and Nabin. I was surprised that they were quite young as all three were in their twenties. Nevertheless they were very professional. However, soon gave in to our chidings and we became friends quickly. The bond we built during the trek which were filled with conversations, laughter and even singing made the experience richer but less tiring. Even with our guards down, they were very careful not to cross the line between client and service providers. Prem also performed ‘surgery’ on one of our member’s shoes which did an alligator. In terms of accommodation, they gave in to our request for en-suite bedrooms in the lodges in the hills which made our rest from the gruelling trek even more rewarding. There was also no addition to cost on this upgrade. On the last day of the tour, Prem acceded to our request to meet pre-school children in the Tibetian refugee camp in Pokhara where we distributed gifts we brought from Singapore. It was fantastic meeting the enthusiastic kids. And just before we were sent to the airport, we were taken to the office of our tour operator in Thamel, where Dolakh, the managing director, presented us with our certificates and a traditional cloth for good luck. It was a bonus that Thamel was shopping heaven for tourist to buy souvenirs at great prices for our loved ones back home. These last two visits were not part of the itinerary but was a very welcomed addition. There are many tour operators in Nepal but we would definitely recommend Mountain Mart based on our positive experience. They really took care of us and we felt the bond that we created went beyond business.

13days Annapurna Circuit Trek. My husband and I just went to the Annapurna Circuit from 31Oct 2014. The weather was just perfect with clear blue sky. I am glad that we chose the right trekking company(MMT). Dolakh was our trip planner and Tilak was our trekking guide. The trip they planned for us was just great, and more importantly with reasonable price! Dolakh responded to our email quickly, whenever we have the questions about preparing for trip. Honestly, we are planning go for Langtang Trek with this company next year!

Manaslu Trek October 2014. We trekked the Manaslu and Tsum Valley with Mountain Mart. Our guide , Tilak, was wonderful. Apart from being caring and helpful, Tilak brought us down the mountain safely after the terrible blizzards and avalanches in this area.If Tilak had made the wrong choices , we may have been among the many casualties at that time.I highly recommend Mountain Mart and I have trekked Nepal several times with different companies.

Absolutely fantastic . I really don't understand why other people go with the far more expensive other trekking companies such as ACE himalayas or intrepid, Mountain mart treks is top quality at such a competitive price. We booked our 12 day everest base camp trek almost one year in advance and were kept in regular contact with the team. Dolakh in particular was happy to reply to my constant emails during the months as I had plenty of questions! The team picked us up from Nepal airport and took us to see Dolakh at his office for a meeting before our trek the next day. He provided us with all the paperwork and information that we needed including all the gear that was promised to us. They even dropped us to our hotel after. We could not have asked for anything more during the following 12 days. We were transported to the airport and picked up at the other in end in Lukla by our guide and porter who were absolutely fantastic during the trek. Our guide, Lochan, was kind, enthusiastic, flexible and encouraging the entire time. If you're able to request him then go for it! We were fed all our meals and given plenty of tea breaks during the day which was all included in the price. As the trek got harder (after day 6/7) Lochan provided us with chocolate bars to keep our energy levels up which was a great help. Whilst we were on the trek we also noticed that porters from other companies would go ahead and leave the groups behind, meeting them at the guest houses later on. However, our porter (Super Binad!) did no such thing. He stayed alongside us every step of the way just in case we needed anything from our bags. He even told us that he knew we would feel more comfortable having our bags nearby. He even offered to carry my girlfriend up the final few steps when she was struggling with it all!! We kindly declined but the constant words of encouragement from them both meant that we were able to complete the experience. Lochan, our guide, was incredibly knowledgeable about the trek and the routes being able to give us a literal step by step guide of how the route and the terrain would pan out. Trust me, you will want to know where all the steep hills are! He was even able to educate us on what feelings were normal and not so normal to experience due to the altitude which we found very helpful and gave us peace of mind. When we were feeling unwell he provided us with medication and advice, all of which helped us. Due to both of their friendliness and warm heartednessnes we grew very close to them over the 12 days and this just made the whole experience more enjoyable. I couldn't speak more highly of Dolakh and his team and the incredible value for money that they provided us with. I really hope they rise up the list of trekking companies as the experience was one that we will never forget. We left Nepal with a once in a life time achievement and many some new friends. All the best guys!!

outstanding effort from everyone!. I trekked the Annapurna circuit for 14 days with Mountain mart treks finishing in late November. The service provided from Dolakh was simply fantastic, easy to organise and one of the cheapest and well thought out plans available.I just wanted to say thank you very much to MMT and especially to Prem my guide who did an awesome outstanding job, I was anxious about doing the trek alone but within the first night Prem made me feel like a long time friend. The trek was amazingly planned out, physically challenging but immensely rewarding! the views were simply stunning and this was only possible through Dolakhs planning and Prems hard work.To MMT thank you for a wonderful once in a life time experience, I hope to return to Nepal to do EBC and MMT will be first call when it comes to organising that trip and hopefully Prem can be our guide again.

EBC Trek 16 days. This was just an outstanding experience from start to finish. The team at Mountain Mart had everything sorted. When you decide to go on a holiday like this, why try and do everything yourself. Get the people that know what they are doing involved and that's Mountain Mart. From Dolakh at head office to the guides and the porters just an outstanding team they couldn't do enough for you and for that I thank them from the bottom of my heart. You made a dream come true. I just hope we can do this again one day !!!!

Outstanding tour and agency!. I did the Annapurna base camp trek with Mountain Mart in early Nov 2014 and had a fantastic experience. Moutain Mart made everything super easy and enjoyable and they were very professional. Someone met me at the airport when I arrived at Kathmandu and took me to a hotel, then I met with Dolakh, the director (who is great and speaks excellent English) that day and we went over the itinerary and he adjusted it a bit to make sure it met what I was hoping to get out of the trek and he also double checked that I had everything I needed. The trek was fantastic and my guide, Ganesh, worked super hard to make sure we were staying in the best places and to make sure I had everything I needed. He was an excellent guide and though his English wasn't perfect, it was good and he made up for any lack of English skills with his eagerness to help, his kindness, and his willingness to teach me the basics of Nepalese. It also seemed like he knew every inch of the trail and all the places and people along the way, which was great. I felt entirely safe the entire time and felt like I was in good hands! I met other trekkers along the trail who were traveling with other companies and who felt their guides were trying to cheat them or who didn't trust their guides and I didn't experience that at all. At the end of the trek Dolakh again made sure I had everything I needed and even came to see me off to the airport, which was a nice personal touch. I would definitely trek with Mountain Mart again and hope to one day soon!

Life time experience!. I had choosen Poon Hill trek as my first attempt in experiencing trekking. It had been amazing and a wonderful trek for me. The MD has been very helpful, prompt with experienced information that catered for my pace so that i can enjoy the wonderful scenic of Nepal throughout my trek and stay in Nepal.I will definitely come back again for my next trek.

Unforgettable "Grand Nepal tour" in 14 days. Nepal has a lot to offer, but how to disclose? We found Mountain Mart as a reliable organisation in the middle of Kathamndu. Dolakh (the owner) is clear and prompt in his anwsers and he set up a fantastic programme for us. To share with everyone who likes an adventurious experience in Nepal: Poon Hill 4 day trekking; rafting on Trishuli river; Kathmandu city tour; Pokhara Himalayla golfcourse; Chitwan jungle expirience; Nagarkot with one day hike back to Kathmandu; Bakthapur; biggest stupa and highest temples. personal driver and car with english speaking guide and porters to make life an unforgettable holiday for me and three (adult) sons. Hotels, lodges are available in all classes. Do not forget to check on tripadvisor. Rooms and bathrooms in trekking area are usually not European standard.
Tamang Heritage Trail. Amazing trek off the beaten tracks! The best moment of our holidays! MD of the company is very helpful.
4 days trek in Annapurna and 4 days trek in Tamang. Very professional company, with a special mention for Tamang trekking, my favorite !The MD of the company was very friendly and helpful !

Bucket list check. I did a 14 day trek to EBC and cho la pass with my guide tilak and porter kagi. Tilak was an absolutely outstanding guide. He was extremely knowledgable and went above and beyond in his duties as our guide. More than this he is one of the most kind and open hearted people I have had the pleasure to meet. You really made our trip special tilak, thank you so much. Then there was kagi. Your a bloody superhuman mate, thanks for making trip so much easier!! If you book with mountain mark ASK for Tilak and Kagi! You won't regret it

Mountain Mart Treks, 5days Poon Hill (短期旅程). We had our first trekking trip to Pokhara-Ghorepani-Poon Hill 5 days from Kathmandu. It was very short itinerary but fulfilling trip. (It was actually 3.5 days if you start from Pokhara. You may consider taking flights Kathmandu-Pokhara both ways if your time is limited.) Lots of rocky, steep up & downhills (with donkeys s**t), better to train yourself before going, then, fun trekking is guaranteed! Beautiful Annapurna and Dhaulagiri as well as scenic trails are there for you. Lastly, Mr.Dolakh, MD of the company was very friendly and helpful with fast response to email. Also, thanks a lot for Mr.Badri, guide from Mountain Mart Treks and his porter team, they were excellent, took good care of us and always tried to deal flexibly with our request. We'll be back to Nepal!短期でも充実した旅程を捜している方にお勧めします。ただし急な石段状の昇り降りが多いので運動不足にはチャレンジングです。

Stunning trip. I did an 18day EBC and Gokyo lake trip with Mountain Mart. Dolakh was very helpful answering my questions and customising my itinerary to match my needs. The flight up to Lukla was made easy with the company, and getting around Kathmandu. The Everest region was stunning, and although I've heard the springtime flowers of Annapurna are more beautiful, I was pleasantly surprised by the variety and views around Everest, and constant backdrop of soaring peaks. Ratna Lama was an attentive guide who was flexible to changes we wanted to make. I enjoyed my trip very much. * and the weather was a bonus - it was a risk going at the end of monsoon, but had great weather and less crowds

Awesome Company. When I was looking for treks in Nepal Dolak at Mountain Mark Treks was so helpful. He answered all of my questions and helped me choose which trek was most suited to us. Tilak our guide and Sudip our porter were amazing and made the trek so much fun. Nothing was too much and they really looked after us.The trek itself was stunning and would highly recommend it to anyone. We did the four day around trip to Poon Hill.I will definitely trek with them again.Natalie

Trustable and fantastic journey !!!. This was an unplanned trip . When I saw many positives reviewed about this company. I straight away contact this company via email. Surprisingly , Dolakh ( director ) reply every single of my email promptly.Dolakh also arranged the iternary based on my need. We do 4 days trekking at Ponnhill and stayed about 8 days in Nepal. Our flight was reschedule early 4 hours, I quickly email to Dolakh regarding my departure time and surprising we managed to communicate via email only. When we arrived at TIA, we were greet by profesional tour guide PRem and our driver. 8 days in nepal, I really impressed with their hospitality ( Dolakh, Prem and team) .all activities went smoothly and following the scheduled. 4 days trekking was like an amazing experience that I never get in my own country. prem is a good guide . He can cimunicate in english very well and has vast knowldge about trekking and nepal respectively. Last but not list, I recommend this company if you looking for Pletoric experience in nepal .will come to nepal to explore more and more . NAMASTE NEPAL. Once is not enough . From . Malaysia truly asia,,,

Long years of experience. Since many years I know Dholak personally, long before he started his MountainMartTreks. I have forgotten even how many times I visited Nepal - its my favorite country. unforgettable and memorable time in Nepal. An awesome trekking experience for private tour with Mountain Mart Treks & Expedition.. Most Unforgettable Nepalese Adventure!. My friends & I made our very 1st trip to Nepal in December last year. Through strong recommendation by another friend who has trekked with Dolakh several times, we decided to engaged his service. Dolakh was really helpful, patiently and promptly replying our numerous queries through email. He helped put together a 15 days itinerary which included an awesome trek at Langtang, day tours in Kathmandu & a short safari at Chitwan National Park.Dolakh personally received us at the airport and was a perfect host. At Kathmandu, we stayed at the FUJI HOTEL, which is a short walk away to bustling Thamel area where we could easily stock up on our trekking necessities. A day tour of Kathmandu was arranged by Dolakh, we were driven in a clean & comfortable car to various Unesco World Heritage sites and given ample time to explore the fascinating sites on our own. We even witnessed traditional cremation rites at the Crematoria at Pashupatinath Temple!The ultimate highlight has to be our 8days trek in beautiful Langtang. Our guide TILAK and porter SUDIP were excellent, they were attentive and took good care of my friends who were on their first long mountain trek. The Langtang trail meanders through breathtakingly beautiful valleys with quaint villages and amazing terraced fields, precarious suspension bridges, magical montane forests, meeting the very friendly villagers and finally a climb to the summit of Kyanjin Ri (4779m).After our trek, we made a short safari trip to Chitwan National Park where we got close encounters with elephants, indian one-horned rhinoceros and many other wildlife. Particularly unforgettable was a canoe ride along a river with numerous mugger crocodiles & indian gharials basking on the river banks!!!Having enjoyed our Nepalese adventure so much, I'm already making plans for another trek end of this year... with Mountain Mart of course!

Everest Base Camp, Kala Patthar, Cho-la Pass, Gokyo-Ri.... I had a great time in Nepal thanks to Dolakh and his team from Mountain Mart Treks. Everest Base Camp. When we decided to do this trek we had no idea who to book it with. Everest Base Camp Success. I booked my Everest Base Camp trek with Mountain Mart Treks.When researching the trip I found western based trekking companies to be expensive and so I wanted to book a more reasonably priced trip with a Nepal based agency.This can be a bit confusing as there are so many companies and you don't know who you are paying your money to.I contacted them by email and let them know my requirements.When I got to Nepal, Mountain Mart delivered on everything they promised to me by email.- Airport pickup/dropoffs for my international and Lukla flights which they had booked- Stayed at the best tea houses on the trail- Single room each night- Good food provided for breakfast, lunch and dinner inclusive in the price- Provided sleeping bag, down jacket and trekking poles- A guide who I could trust and who was determined to ensure I got to base camp and Kala PattharI really enjoyed the trek, everything went perfectly and I have no hesitation to recommend booking your Everest Base Camp trek with Mountain Mart Treks.

Excellent Hike to Everest Base Camp. Me and my friend did the 12 day hike to Everest Base camp with Mountain Mart Treks. The Hike itself was tough but the scenery was incredible and the completion of the trek was rewarding. We had a private tour with a guide and a porter for two of us. The guide was extremely helpful and his english was good. He helped choosing appropriate foods to avoid sickness and stomach issues on the climb up and was always looking out for our best interests. The porter we had was an absolute machine! He had no issues carrying the extra clothes and supplies we decided to pass his way. The tour was very relaxed and we had the opportunity to provide our input as to what we wanted to accomplish and how quickly we wanted to accomplish it. I never felt rushed on the trek and the pace was set based on how we were feeling that day. The price and timing for the trek was also desirable. The trek with mountain mart treks was a couple days shorter than other companies which I preferred since it allowed for more time spent in Kathmandu and touring other areas. The price was also much less than other companies. Overall I enjoyed the trek and would recommend using Mountain Mart treks for your own trip in the future.
Memories to last a lifetime. . Fabulous trek with mountain mart treks.Would not hesitate to recommend them for anyone interested in hiking in Nepal.

A Truly Awakening Experience. Thamel Travels & Tours was an excellent selection for our stay in Kathmandu, Nepal. Everyone within the organization was extremely punctual and attentive, and very concerned with the well-being and happiness of our group. If someone felt sick and needed to go home early, or if someone was having trouble with something, or if any problem arose, the tour guides would personally make sure that the matter was dealt with, often times even going with them in a taxi back to the hotel to make sure they were safe and attended to. Our tour guides had a wealth of information that they were readily and happily able to divulge upon us, and no matter how tired and weary we became, they were able to manage us and keep us in good spirits. I took the time to speak with them one on one to just ask and learn more about Nepal, the culture, the religions, the political landscape, etc., and they were both excited and eager to tell me whatever I wanted to know. These were just altogether friendly, smart, and organized folks who managed to deliver a wonderful experience of Nepal for our group. I am incredibly grateful for their service!

everest base camp trek. I picked Thamel Tours because I needed to do a shortened version of the trek, we will visited all the peaks, but I needed to do it 1-2 days faster. Balaram was quick to communicate and said it was doable to create a more customized shortened trek with one less day of acclimatization so I went with him. Initially I was disappointed because I was alone with my guid/porter and not in a group when I arrived to Lukla, but I am very glad for that in the long run, I made friends along the way and we made our own group, and honestly I am not sure I would've enjoyed stopping and waiting for others as selfish as that may sound. There were a few hiccups as is often the case with travel and I won't say that the trip was seamless however in the end, Balaram and his wife were lovely and communicative and I recommend the Everest base camp trek and Thamel travel and tours to anyone who is considering. When I come back for the Anapourna trek I will be sure to call them again.

EBC Trek. My friends and I had a very enjoyable EBC trek with Thamel Travels. Balaram and Dipesh were always honest, polite, and took good care of us on this challenging and rewarding journey. Recommended

Poonhill trek & Kathmandu city tour. Thamel Travels & Tours is an excellent tour company based in Kathmandu, Nepal. They gave us a cheap tour package for our Nepal trip which included: hotels in Kathmandu & Pokhara, Poonhill guided trek, & Kathmandu city tour. Balaram, the owner, & his wife, Saru were very accommodating and helpful to all our needs. They made sure we had a wonderful time in our stay in Nepal. Next time we return to Nepal, we will surely engage their services again.

Excellent Poonhill Trek and Bhutan tour. I booked a 4 days Poon trek at Annapurna and a short Bhutan cultural tours with Balaram at Thamel travels and tours. The tour services that we received from 2 different guides, porters, driver went as smooth as we could have expected. In fact, it was above and beyond our expectation. The tea houses at the Poonhill trek offerred fabulous views and hospitality. At different places the tea house quality were different and all of them were best availables. In Bhutan, Balaram upgraded our hotel at Thimpu to Ariya Boutique hotel without extra costs. We saw some of the guests paying upto $60 per person to upgrade to this hotel.

I used Thamel for all my travel needs. I'm overall very impressed by the outstanding service I've received from Balaram and his team. From the very beginning I felt taken care of and had great service. I booked my travel to Chitwan through them and ended up in a very nice hotel and had a great time. I also did the Everest base camp trek and had an outstanding stay in the Himalayas. I always felt like I was in competent care and thoroughly enjoyed both trips, when coming back to Kathmandu and looking for a day tour of the city, I didn't even think to look anywhere else. Check this travel company out, you won't be disappointed.

Disappointing compared to Trip Adviser Reviews. I agonised over this review as it was a great experience overall, but the component parts of our trip do not reflect others on Trip Adviser (the reason we picked Thamel Tours).Balaram was great with his response to our initial enquiry; quick to answer all our questions including around reassurances of providing some kit we lacked. The guides, driver and porter were genuine friendly guys who tried hard and solved problems when they arose but there were a bit too many which added up to a more hassle-filled experience than we hoped for.The promised kit never materialised, we asked to move accommodation one night as it was filthy and substantially lower standard than other nights (I'm fine with teahouses but I don't want mould everywhere) and we're lucky something was available, we weren't told we needed things which we hadn't brought, the car broke down (can't be helped) and we had to rely on taxis and their availability for chunks of the journey so there was hanging around. We get the impression our tour was organized at the last minute based on a repeated request for our passport details (including one a 8pm the night before we were due to set off after I had called and then emailed to check everything was ok),lack of equipment, and poor choice of accommodation on the third night as well as something one of our guides mentioned about us "booking yesterday" when we had confirmed at least ten days beforehand.If I am being brutally honest our guide's English, although a million times better than my Nepali, did not appear as good as others and we missed chatting along the way as it was difficult to communicate naturally and a lot of our questions were misunderstood no matter how often we tried to rephrase them, and as a result I felt we missed out on learning quite a bit as we went along as well as chat over meals and tea breaks. Our guides 'lost us' on occasion. They were ahead of us and out of sight for large parts of the trek. While this was not a problem in itself we saw tonnes of trekkers on the route and NOT ONE group - no matter age or ability level -had a guide who was not with them seemingly at all times.While we enjoyed ourselves, cumulatively the organization fell below our expectations given other Trip Adviser reviews.Based on our experience I couldn't recommend Thamel Travels to others, but we do appear to be in a minority on that here.Finally, do check what you are signing up for. This trek was sold to us as 'easy' with a 'gentle climb' (up 3200 steps!). It's steep and long days of climbing- if you don't have a base level of fitness or dodgy knees think carefully before embarking on it. We, and many we met, were surprised by how physically challenging it was - even if the views are spectacular!

Amazing Annapurna Base Camp. My boyfriend and I booked a trip to Annapurna Base Camp with Thamel tours and had an unforgettable experience. We chose this company because we were in contact with the owner 'Balaram' who is a very nice guy and he gave us a reasonable price for the trek compared to other companies. The trip ended up being one of the best experiences we have had during our 6 months travelling. Accompanying us were our porter/guide 'Niraj' and our guide 'Santosh'. Niraj was excellent with sorting out all our accomodation ,providing us our meals and making sure that we felt comfortable and had a great time. We would highly recommend him as a guide. Although he was also our porter he is licensed as a guide speaks good English and is extremely experienced. He has connections with lots of the owners of the tea houses so will always book with the best tea houses along the way. He has done the ABC trek 50 times!. Santosh our guide was very intelligent and spoke perfect English. He is training in the medical field so when we were heading furthur up it was reassuring to have a calming influence. This trek was just like trekking with friends.

Wonderful trip. I and my sister visited Kathmandu in sept, Balaram and wife Saru has render their professional service to us from airport transfer to Hotel and arrange tour guide for us. Namche and Kathmandu sightseeing. Enjoyed the trek with a thamel travels and tours . Itinerary and accomodation was well catered and flexible to suit personal interests . Everest View Trek and cultural tour of Kathmandu. We did the Everest view trek ( Kathmandu- Lukla- Namche- Syangboche) in October 2016. We booked our trek with Thamel Travels and Tours. Highly recommended agent for Nepal. We had an amazing two weeks in Nepal organised by Balaram. The itinerary was great, Kathmandu,Trishuli river rafting, Pokhara, short 3 days 2 nights trekking, Chitwan National Park with jungle walk and canoe ride, amazing sunrise views from Nagarkot, tour of Bhaktapur etc. included all accommodation, guides, private transfers, entry fees, breakfast, etc all at a very very reasonable cost. All hotels he picked for us were to a very good standard, exceeded expectations, and all of them were in very good location.Balaram's wife Saru and their little daughter showed us around Kathmandu, very nice people, very friendly and informative tour in a beautiful city, we really enjoyed it!Dipesh, our trekking guide made our short 3 days hike to Australian Camp and to Dhampus unforgettable, he is very good guide and communicator, a real people person. The guide on our jungle walks was also very very good, very passionate about Chitwan with huge knowledge about the area and the wildlife. On the tour of Bhaktapur the guide we had was Amit, who has a real passion for the history and culture of the city and also for photography what is a common interest we share. He showed us not just the touristy places but other areas of Bhaktapur, too what made it so much more interesting for us, seeing the locals in their everyday life and celebrating Dashain festival. We also really enjoyed the few hours rafting on the way to Pokhara from Kathmandu, the guys operating the rafting business are great, it really is a fun activity for anyone.Must mention the private car transfers in between places, too. Comfortable cars, good drivers, must mention Mahesh, our last driver who has a great personality, funny but informative and very polite, made our journeys very enjoyable.Thank you, Balaram and team, we will be back!

EBC trek. We were very impressed with the outstanding service that Balaram and his company provided to us from start to finish. He facilitated and organised a short notice two person trek for us in order to fit in with our holiday dates. The price was very reasonable and our guide Rabin was faultless. He provided great company and knowledge on the trek and we felt in safe hands. On return to Kathmandu, Balaram recommended a great hotel for us to spend our last few days. We would highly recommend his company and guide Rabin to any future trekkers!

Balaram Is Great. From our airport shuttle to our departure shuttle Belaram and his crew took wonderful care of our group. Saru was our hostess away from home and very enjoyable. While playing and promoting baseball we fit in all kinds of tours and visits. If you need a great tour/travel company this is the one!

Thamel Tours Did A Wonderful Job For Us!. I brought a group of 24 travelers to Kathmandu for a week long tour of the major sites, and of course, a flight around Mount Everest. Balaram did an outstanding job organizing the original schedule and then adapting it day-by-day as we dealt with weather and other activities. We did everything we had planned and by watching the weather we flew to Everest on the only day that had flights during our stay. I highly recommend Thamel Travel and would use them again. As they also do Tibet and Bhutan, they will also be the first ones I contact if we go to either of these places.

Friendly and Fantastic. On relatively short notice and with only a few days in Nepal, Balaram put together an amazing itinerary and really took great care of me. He is very detailed and clear, and he is very reasonably priced. When I come back, he is my first and only contact.

Amazing experience!. I had such a fantastic time on my adventure, a 30 day trip, and the company was absolutely awesome! I described what type of trip I wanted, and they made a perfect itinerary for me. I loved all the places I stayed and the tours and excursions I did! The owners are so very kind, and all the employees were lovely as well! I highly recommend them! I will be back again, and use them again for my next trip there! Thanks so much for everything!

Mt everest base camp . The owner Balaram is very nice and very orgainsed. The tour company picked us from the airport and the accommodation they booked for us in Kathmandu is very clean and comfort. The price for the whole trip is very reasonable too. Our guide Dipesh is very knowledgeable, friendly and helpful. He always make sure we are ok during trekking. The whole trip is certainly unforgettable and beautiful. The only downside is the weather wasn't good so we waited for 3 days to get the flight to Lukla. We had to alter our itinerary in case we miss our flight back to Australia. We didn't check our itinerary after it was altered. In my opinion our flight from Lukla to Kathmandu was booked too early which didn't allow us enough time to do the EBC trek comfortably. We walked 11 hrs one day in order to catch the flight on time. My suggestion is to double check ur itinerary to make sure u have enough time for trekking and be aware of flight cancellation due to weather condition ( it happens very often).  Overall the trip is great and I highly recommended Thamel travel.

Kathmandu Trip (From Dubai, UAE). We are more than happy that we used Thamel Tours and travels to organise our recent trip to Kathmandu, Nepal. Their experienced travel experts tailor made our itinerary to suit our requirements. We travelled from Dubai, and all pre travel queries through email were promptly answered by Mr. Balaram. Guides spoke good English and were knowledgeable , not only about the sites visited but also the culture and nuances of the local people. In particular we were bowled over by the enthusiasm and passion of our guide Mr. Balaram Pandey (Who himself is the owner of Thamel Tours & Travels),during last day of our trip in Kathmandu who made our holiday truly memorable. We will not hesitate to use Thamel Tours & Travels in the future and will also recommend them to our friends. Thanks Balaram, for organizing our trip well.

An amazing experience of Nepal. Everyone from the agency was extremely helpful and very accommodating. Balaram was very prompt in replying emails and made the effort to to meet us before we left to explore other parts of the country. Ravi was our guide for most of the trip and a very good one at that! We were supposed to go to Chitwan but detoured to Dhampus due to the bad road conditions. I must say that the latter was the highlight of the trip for both my mother and I. Thank you once again to everyone from Thamel Travel, we hope to see you again. Namaste :)

Accommodating and thoughtful. I took a cultural/sightseeing tour with my father, who is over 80 yrs old. Thamel Travel was very accommodating, and was quite happy to adjust the itinerary based on our needs and interests. For example, instead activities such as trekking, we offered less strenuous activities, such as visits to handicraft workshops instead, or shorter walks on more even terrain. Thamel Travel was also flexible in adjusting the itinerary based on weather -- for example, we were supposed to spend the night at Nagarkot to catch Himalayan views, but because of bad weather, we would not have been able to see much of a view. So Thamel Travel just organized Nagarkot as a day trip, and we did not have to pack/unpack and change hotels unnecessarily.
Nothing short of exceptional. The Thamel team is absolutely amazing. Really care about their clients and are so caring. They were warm and friendly and went above and beyond for us.

Beautiful country and great companions. We can really recommend Raven Travel and especially its guide Pema Tshering! We travelled several days through Bhutan and learned a lot about the country, its history and customs. We joked that there was only one other country where one is not allowed to travel by alone. But there all comparison with that country stops. Bhutan is a friendly country where tourists are really treaded as guests. Everyone is friendly and open. We experienced beautiful temples and dzongs, great eco lodges and hotels, as well as the hospitality of a local family in a traditional house (with a great hot stone bath). One of the most beautiful experiences was the trekking to the Tigersnest! In the days we were in Bhutan we became good friends with our (singing) guide and our vollllli5driver! We had a lot of fun together and became Facebookfriends to stay in contact!

Cultural sightseeing tours. We had a wonderful experience of touring around the cultural heritage sites of Kathmandu valley. Thamel tours has the most experienced guides for this tour. We had amazing guide Prakash to accompany us throughout the city. He is the most knowledgeable and friendly guide we ever hired for a cultural tour. Thamel tours also gave us the best rate in the town for the tour!!
wonderful Ebc Trek. We Have wonderful Esprince of Doing Everast Base Cump Trek With Thamel Tours We Had Guide Rabin And 2 porters For Us 4 people Truly wonderful Thank you So much Rabin And Team

Peaceful and smooth organizer. The experience with Thamel team became unique and memorable with their expertise to organize tours in the Himalayas. We travelled to rainshadow Mustang area in the Annapurna trans Himalaya. It was Balaram to suggest us that trek. The upper part of Mustang was just beautiful. We saw the cliffs where cave civilization existed in BCEs. It was one of the ancient civilizations in the Himalayas. We spent 2 days to roam around the village of Lo and surroundings. And the best part was, Our guide Robin made our trek so special and smooth with his dedication and honesty.Chat Conversation End

realvalue for the tour prices. We had a very memorable tour of Kathmandu cultural tour with Thamel guide. A 3 full days tour of historical and cultural sites in Kathmandu was very insightful. Thamel team gave us very good price for the tour.

Tour visit of UNESCO cultural visit of Nepal. A long time wait to visit Lumbini, the birth place of Buddha, turned in to reality with Thamel Travels. Balaram is the best!!. My husband and I booked through Thamel Tours and Balaram made it easier than I could have imagined. His willingness to cater the trip to our specific needs (not to mention at a fair price) in addition to his friendly personality and patient nature made working with him a true delight. I would recommend Thamel Tours to anyone looking for adventure in Nepal.

Ever best holiday tour for our family. Our family had a wonderful holiday in Nepal with Thamel Travels and Tours. The owner, Balaram, is wonderful person with all smiling face. you are the best thamel team. overall tour was great balaram the owner gave us very good price for a week tour around nepal we loved it thamel is best place to travel like local experiehces our gvide was most flexible person with very deep knowledge of the region

Kathmandu tours. i booked Nepal tour for about a week at veryr last minute of arrival. Thamel Tours arranged it very smoothly. Excellent guides, and drivers on duty. The accommodation Balaram suggested for us was pleasant as well. Above all, the price was most reasonable

Excellent tour in and around Kathmandu. We arranged a two day private tour with Thamel Tours to explore some of the sights in and around Kathmandu (in May 2016). Balaram was a fantastic tour guide - very knowledgeable, friendly, reliable and patient. Cultural tours. I booked few days kathmad cultural tour at Thamel Tours. The tour took us to different cultural sites of the city and the team met our expectations. Very knowledgeable guides and efficient driver for Kayhmandu roads!!

Lumbini and pokhara tour. Thamel Tours organized private tour for my family. Services are top notch for very very reasonable prices. The fact you can notice about Thamel Team is that they have nothing to hide. Balaram, the owner and manager arranges so neatly and he does is just in front of you. No secrets. Balaram is a great resource in Nepal.... We visited Nepal with kids and parents..2 families of friends together...14 people 6 years old to 75 years old gentleman, all in the group.. thanks to balaram, he understands well what priorities are there when such a diverse group travelling together... great choice of hotels, transport and coordination..it was a seamless arrangement by balaram and his equally capable wife, which made it pleasurable..Strongly recommend balaram and his thamel team...Regards Er. Saidatt Samangaonkar Property valuer and civil engineer Aurangabad Maharashtra India

Tur mustang track. Thamel tour is the best among all. Got best services and tour prices for 2 separate tours. After a very satisfied Upper Mustang trek, we booked a short tour to Chitwan. Wonderful services and excellent guides.

great service. We were confused and did lots of research in search of a company to take us to Everest Base Camp. We were pleased from the beginning of enquiry. Balaram is efficient and hard working to answer the queries with good English. And finally we decided to go with thamel tours. In some points he also customized the itinerary easily. We appreciate his concern and comfort to meet our interest. When we arrived in Kathmandu, Balaram was there, he did not show us his card but amazingly came near us and could catch us. We pack up every thing.Next day we had Lukla flight it was first flight on Buddha air. Luckily we had good time and reached Lukla. From the day we were under the care of Rabin , who is our guide. He was able to book nice room at tea houses. He took good care of us during the entire trip. We reached to the Base Camp! This is what our mission is. It was amazingly beautiful….wow at some point we forgot all the efforts, difficulties to reach there.This is really worth to pay money for the Everest Base Camp. Who ever coming Nepal is highly recommended to go EBC. And without any doubt you can choose Balaram from Thamel Tours. He is honest and responsible person. Thanks to Rabin, he made our EBC trip memorable and we had a wonderful time.

Definitely Above and Beyond. Many thanks to Balaram, Saru and our guides and porters who helped us with our Everest Base Camp trek in April/May. The accomodation and home made food was great. Everything was organised on time, efficiently and easily from the airport transfers to the food, internal flights, luggage etc. Balaram and Saru come highly recommended to anybody looking to tour the everest region. Thanks again guys.

Well organized. Balaram organized a 5 day Poon Hill trek for me including one day in Pokhara before and after the trek. Everything was well planned and organized and when I suddenly asked him on the last day of the trek to change the trek to 4 days and 1 extra night in Pokhara, he managed to do so free of charge. Originally, I was supposed to travel with both a guide and a porter, but Balaram ended up combining them into one guy, which worked quite well. The porter/ guide was a nice guy in his early twenties, but his English wasn't very good, which was very frustrating at times.Overall, I had a great time and would like to thank Balaram for a great trip.

Best for everest base camp trek. We booked 3 passes trek in the everest area for thr end of april 2015.As we had postpone the trek due to earthquake,we did it this year.same price as agreed last year.Excellent services.

Above and beyond!. My brother in law referred me to Thamel Travels and Tours after his Nepal trekking trip last year. When I was planning a similar solo excursion to Poon Hill along the Annapurna Circuit for my birthday (the first week in May), I reached out to Thamel via email for a quote and Mr. Balaram responded almost immediately, which sort of set the tone for our adventure together: stedfast, professional, concise, very helpful and accommodating. After Balaram drafted a detailed itinerary, he met me personally in my hotel the very first night in Nepal. He was always there and available to answer any of my many questions. My personal tour guide, Mohan K.C., was also very knowledgable, courteous and professional. I highly recommend him for any excursion in Nepal.Though out my four-day trek and six days in Nepal, the diligent staff at Thamel made sure I was comfortable and happy during my visit. They arranged my airport transfers, hotel stays, tea house reservations, meals, hiking permits and bus transfers. Everything fell into place seamlessly, which is a testament to their experience in the region and professionalism within the industry.I had a very memorable experience hiking to Poon Hill on my birthday and I have Thamel Travels and Tours to thank for it. I will definitely be coming back to Nepal in the future (with my wife and daughter this time) and I will definitely be working with Thamel again. Thank you Balaram, Mohan and everyone at Thamel.

Good service. Mr. Balaram and wife organized my trip to Lumbini from Kathmandu, all services were included, from shuttle service from Kathmandu to the airport and lodging and tours in Lumbini and Kapilavastu area. The tour guide for Kapilavastu was an amazing young man. I also had another city-tour with them (Bhaktapur and Patan) and again the guide was very very good.
Gentle and Steady. Along with 10 years experience in the field, Balaram have a standard operating procedure from top to toe, let you hassle free in your journey.

EBC trek May 2016. We originally booked for EBC trek for 2015 but due to the earthquake deferred to 2016. Balaram was very helpful and we went in May 2016. We communicated via the internet and Balaram was prompt with his responses with a competitive price. Balaram and his team fully guided through our stay in Kathmandu and on the trek .Ravi our trek guide organised a successful trek to Base camp supported by 3 Porters Prakash, Raj and Ruthra.The trek was harder than our Kilimanjaro trek . 8 days up and 4 back. The nights were cold but the views were amazing. The food was hot and filling in the tea houses. On returning to Kathmandu we stayed at Raniban, Balarams guest house. He organised local trips and his wife cooked lovely food for us.He was always available to help with any issues. Thanks to Balaram and his team we had a lovely trip

Unforgettable Everest Base cmap trek. We did EVerest Base camp trekking private trek for our group of 4 persons. Thamel Travels guides and porters are the masters of the trail and tea houses. They were the best among the people we met. Very reasonable price for the best services.

affordable and reasonably priced tour. I found almost half price for a short Bhutan tour and following Nepal trip. The most knowledgeable and friendly guide and driver made the tour most memorable in our lifetime.

Trip to Nepal - ABC. I was looking for a 10 days trekking tour in Nepal and contact Thamel Tours. They reply very fast and help me to customize the trip. The owner is an amazing guy (Balaram Pandey). I spent the first day at Kathmandu and travel to Pokhara in the next day. The chosen hotels overcome my expectations (clean, modern and close to the city center). In the third day I start the trekking to Annapurna Base Camp, the tour guide (Niraj Aryal) was decisive to make this trip unforgettable (good sense of humour, always ready to help, intelligent and determined in finding the best places to sleep (when you travel alone is not possible to reserve previously the rooms in the mountain guest houses)). In the last day the Pokhara airport close (weather problems) and all flights were cancelled. I call Balaram and in few minutes a taxi was in the airport to carry me to Kathmadu. Fantastic support.Balaram is always online (email, messenger, etc.) so is very easy to talk with him during the tour. Excellent Tour Company.

Go with the flow. What to say about Balaram and his team? I reached out quite late to inquire about a tour of Nepal and from that first email, everything was taken care of beautifully. My desire for a flexible itinerary and tweaking details was accommodated at every step, and I experienced wonderful hospitality and service every day of my adventure. Highlights included a home stay where I got my first (and best!) taste of Dal Bhat courtesy of Saru, a stunning Everest flight, and four wonderful days hiking around Pokhara with my fabulous guide Dipesh. Everyone made sure that my trip was memorable and even logistical challenges such as Pokhara airport being unexpectedly shut, did not phase the Thamel team. An excellent experience from start to end, I'd thoroughly recommend them to anyone visiting Nepal.

Great tour!. Thank you to the Thamel travel crew for a great job and fantastic experience in Nepal for myself. Balaram was very quick to respond to emails and organised a great itinerary at a fair price for my short stay in Nepal. Everything was as described. Kathmandu was very interesting. Particularly want to thank the trekkers Depesh, Needos, Raj and Suresh for being such great and entertaining guides and now friends! They made my Annapurna trekking experience an excellent one. Really enjoyed Nepal thanks to these guys and can't recommend them highly enough!

A dream tour. Thamel Tours and Travels is superb. We arranged a two day tour around Kathmandu valley with them this week, along with a couple of pick ups, and every single aspect of the trip was so professional, enjoyable and high quality - and ran like clock work. Balaram is hugely knowledgable, easy company and has a lovely sense of humour. He is also a very experienced guide. We really appreciated the broad range of information and insights that Balaram shared with us, which made the experience of visiting sights around Kathmandu Valley infinitely richer than if we had gone alone, as well as the fact that he also gave us windows of time to explore them ourselves at our own pace. His recommendations for lunch places were spot on and the flexible nature of the trip (for example, when the views at Nagarkot were misty, adding a visit to Changu Narayan on the way back to Kathmandu and suggesting to visit Pashupatinath at dusk for a more atmospheric visit) really added to the experience of the tour, which was also very reasonably priced. Thank you so much, Balaram!

Amazing Kathmandu City Tour!. I would highly recommend Thamel Travels and Tours to anyone interested in taking a city tour of Kathmandu and the surrounding areas! Balaram was extremely prompt on his response to my inquiry and was great to work with in planning a day tour! Nabaraj and his colleague picked me up from the hotel, as planned, and learned/saw an incredible amount in one day! Although I had only booked a 1 day tour, I did have time the following morning to see Bhaktapur, and after contacting Balaram last minute, he quickly arranged for a tour the following morning with no problems (with the same driver and tour guide). Being a single female traveler, working with Balaram and spending 1.5 day's with his team, including Nabaraj, was absolutely fantastic and flawless- I would highly recommend booking with Thamel Travels and Tours to anyone planning to visit Kathmandu! Thank you, Balaram!

Effortless trip taking in many of the best things Nepal has to offer. We didn't have time to do any organisation so briefed Balaram. His itinerary was great. He's a great communicator over email and in person so discussing his plan got us excited. He's also very flexible. When we arrived he switched a few things around to avoid the bad weather.Once out of Kathmandu, our guides were some of Balaram's staff. They were all really nice and also good communicators. I really like the way there was always a wholesome activity for two or three hours then we had free time to explore (have a nap).The trip was made really easy for us. It meant we didn't feel like intrepid explorers but we had a great time and came home well rested.

So much fun! Can't wait to go back!. Balaram was so wonderful, patient and helpful. Both him and his wife were lovely and made our trip to enjoyable. From all the tours...the attention to detail on things we liked...recommendations, tips and tricks. Should also note Dipesh (or Depesh) was wonderful and took us around Pokhara. Was such a wonderful experience for us both. We Will be back!

Outstanding!! Highly recommended!! . I am a solo traveller & used 'Thamel' tours after finding them on a internet search. The service I received from my 1st point of contact to to final farewell was just excellent. Nothing was to much trouble & everything was organised on my behalf, leaving me stress free & able to fully enjoy my trip. My full trip itinerary was organised from start to finish & was fully adaptable to suit my travel requirements & sight seeing to do list. All my questions were answered prior to my trip in a timely & professional manner. I was met at the airport & warmly welcomed. I stayed 2 nights with Balaram & his beautiful family at their home stay. I changed my trip itinerary in the middle of the week & flew to Pokhara. Balaram arranged all my internal flights additionally & my guides for hiking in Pokhara (nothing was to much trouble) Who were also excellent. I throughly enjoyed seeing all the sights in Pokhara & x2 days of hiking. I was fully accompanied by a guide, who again was very knowledgable, friendly & fun to be around. You totally have to watch the sunrise at Sanagkot, this experience was simply breathtaking. I spent time with the family exploring Kathmandu, Thamel & its surrounding areas. Balarams wife Saru spent time with me explaining the history, cultures & religions & answered my non stop stream of questions. The family were just a delight to be around. They were more than happy to take photos of me as we went along to ensure I could capture both myself & the moment. The mountain flight was just awesome, I would highly recommend this to anyone who visits Kathmandu. Despite it taking x3 attempts to finally get to view Mount Everest! Mother Nature was not on my side initially. This was also fully organised on my behalf.The guest houses & hotel I stayed at were all basic but clean & comfortable. All had wifi & could provide you with a good meal after a full days exploring, hiking or just wandering around this amazing place. Electricity is some what hit & miss in Nepal, so always ask when there will be power & get cameras etc charged during this time! I would also recommend to bring a torch for being out & about after dark. Sturdy footwear is a must as the streets/pavements etc are some what beat up. Despite much evidence of last years earthquake still visible, daily life continues as normal & everyone smiles, seriously they do, Nepalese are such happy & friendly folk. Thanks to Balaram, his family & my awesome guides, this trip was just the most excellent travel experience. I felt safe & in very good hands 24/7. Nepal is fully open for tourism, hiking & trekking. I will be back again for sure!

Amazing time in Nepal!!. We had a wonderful experience in Nepal. The entire trip was very well organised. We felt safe & in very good capable friendly hands. We got amazing views of the Annapurna Himalayan range, the trek was just perfect. Thanks again for everything Bararam, Saru, Robin & Zuriz and especially for your hospitality and care. Really felt that we came as guests and left as friends... ;) keep up the great work, you are making a lot of people happy :-)

Great time in Nepal!. I had a wonderful trip in Nepal with Thamel Travels and Tours. They were able to customize an itinerary that allowed me to do a combination of sightseeing and hiking. I would definitely recommend Thamel again!Only thing I would say is that if you take the Mountain flight to see Everest (which is amazing), try not to get seated in the first row. Amazing nine days in ABC and poon hill with Dipesh. We did our trek with a Porter and our guide Dipesh. When you go through thamel tours I highly recommend using him as your guide. Great customized tour, highly flexible. I had little time in Kathmandu and I wanted to make the most of it. Balaram, my tour guide was amazing and build up a plan based on what I wanted to see and do. I highly recommend and definetely I will come back to Nepal

Great trip. Had a great trip in Nepal. Thanks to Balaram for organising everything and rookie for the great driving and guiding. Balaram was excellent to communicate with prior to arrival and made my first visit to Nepal easy and fun. Would recommend to anyone visiting.

Amazing mountain flight. The experience was fantastic and well worth the cost. The arrangement was great, especially Balaram is very nice and flexible man. We did the mountain flight with thamel travel. IT was amazing.

Perfect private walking tour for an intro to Kathmandu. As a young solo female traveller I'm a little cautious choosing private tours. Ganesh Himal Trek!. We had a beautiful experience with thamel travel and the team. Balram is amazing and very helpful. Our trekking guide Rabin is kind and caring. It was nice to have beautiful himalayan views. We like the team work and their service. Our overall experience was beautiful.
Heli tours. Thanks for the arrangement for heli tours for us. We had fabulous mountain views. It was amazing. Thanks Balaram and Thamel Travel.

Great service. We used this company to arrange a 7 day tour of Nepal covering Kathmandu, Chitwan and Pokhara. A very unique and special experience . Balaram and his family welcomed us this January into his home and gave us one of the best holidays we have ever been on. Our trekking guide also impressed us, we have already decided we will use him again when we seek more adventure.This personalised tour exceeded our expectations of Nepal and made us fall in love with the people, food and culture. Thank you very much!We will be back for some more gundruk (fermented spinach pickle served with dal bhat - YUM!) :)

Bhutan Deluxe Tours. The tour was excellent. Before fixed the program we asked lot of questions to Balram. He is more flexible to modify the program as per our interest and specific requirements. He can meet all our interest and helped us to make it a memorable experience. He initially gave us more options but we chose this deluxe tour with deluxe hotels. He is very attentive and everything was to my satisfaction.

Wonderful Holiday in Nepal!. My family and I went for a holiday in Nepal in Oct/Nov 2015. I worked with Balaram at Thamel Travels through emails and he answered promptly. We were very pleased with Balaram and staff for making our holiday in Nepal a memorable one and more importantly, a very safe one. We took a 12-day tour package that covered Kathmandu, Pokhara, Dhampus, Chitwan and Nagarkot. Balaram is a very friendly, calm, respectful, polite and a wonderful person. There was a fuel crisis and he handled the situation very well and ensured that we could carry on with our tour. He ensured on our safety and advised us not to go to Lumbini due to some unrest over there. Beautiful Nepal holiday thanks to Thamel Travels!. You beauty Nepal! We've left feeling totally enriched from your culture and heritage. Best tour company to travel with in Nepal. My family and I spent 9 days travelling in Nepal with Thamel Travel. Despite some difficulties caused by the fuel shortage we managed to do everything we had planned. The hotels and guides booked for us were all excellent. Honest & Trustworthy Company. Our family did a short trek up Poon Hill which included a private car from Kathmandu to Pokhara. Balaram, the owner, picked us up from the airport and whisked us off to our hotel in Pokhara. Everything went exceptionally smoothly and the trip was just as Balaram had quoted in his email. Our drive to/from Pokhara was exceptionally long. Expect at least 6 hours, but it took almost 8 on the return due to traffic. The roads are really bad, so consider flying if you dislike fumes, windy roads and slow traffic.Our hike was great and our guide wonderful. We left from Nyapul at 10am and were above Uleri by 4pm. The next day we walked to Ghorepani and then straight on up Poon Hill. No one on the summit except for us. The following day we hiked all the way down to Nyapul which almost killed us. We left at 8am and were picked up at 2pm by Balaram. We are in good shape, but the downhill over stones was torture on the legs. In retrospect we should have gone slower or taken another day.Overall, I can highly recommend Balaram and his company for hiking at great prices. Hopefully we 'll be back one day for a longer stay.

There are still plenty of historical structures still left standing and completely undamaged, so please visit soon if possible!

Bang for your buck!. We, as a family of 5, travelled through the usual tourist route of Kathmandu-Pokhara-Chitwan in March. I honestly contacted them based on nothing but their positive Tripadvisor reviews, and Balaram and company ensured they delivered to the standard. All flights within Nepal including Kathmandu-Pokhara and Bharatpur-Kathmandu (A small name discrepancy on the latter which was quickly sorted out by Balaram) were booked per time and request. Hotels stays except Chitwan (which I had booked myself) were done very well and the packages were quite reasonable compared to online rates. In addition, the company handles crises as well, amply visible by how they handled the flight cancellations which had happened due to the recent crash landing at Kathmandu airport. We were charged no extra cancellation or booking fees on either hotels or internal flights, and aside from 1 change in the schedule due to room availability, everything was the same as originally booked. Kathmandu as a city I found pretty disappointing, but the guides did their best, our Pokhara guide was pretty enthusiastic too. The only small note I would leave is that Balaram seems to the most capable among the team, and if for some reason he is away facilitating a trekking expedition, co-ordination with the company can get a bit difficult. However, if you're with Balaram, rest assured, you're all set.

Amazing 4 Days in Kathmandu with Thamel Travels. My husband and I have just returned from an amazing 4 day visit in Kathmandu. Insightful Day with an Awesome Guide. This is undoubtedly the most cost effective option of most of the Kathmandu tours I explored, and we had an amazing experience. Other similar well-rated companies were asking for at least $90. Galendra (I may be butchering his name...) was so knowledgeable, well-spoken and funny, and it was a blast spending the day with him. We learned so much about Hinduism, Buddhism, and Nepali history.This was an incredibly reasonable price to pay for a top-notch guide; if you are being quoted $90 by other companies, I would definitely aim for this option, as the service was amazing, and the experience is a positive and memorable one.

services. Balaram is spot on with his work , you will be hard pressed to find anyone better in Thamel. Very happy with his assistance with all my travel around the Himalayas for the entire year of my stay in Kathmandu.

Perfect tailor made service, very good English, highly recommended . We are family with 3 children, age 5, 7, 10. Have spent 4 days in Kathmandu and around. This agent was a perfect choice for us, we emailed him first our generic wish list (how many hours per day, what sort of attractions to see) and Mr Balaram (the owner of the company) prepared a tailor made program. On the ground everything was well organized, always sharp on time and no bad surprises regarding price - all as we agreed upfront. All tourist fee,entrance tickets to the historical buildings etc was already included in the price we agreed with the guide upfront so we could plan out expenses perfectly and reliably upfront, so no extras or add ons during the days. The 8 seat off road car was very new, air con perfectlyworking and both the guide and the driver spoken perfect English. When traveling with kids we prefer relaxed pace so changing program during the day on our request was never a problem. The guys also arranged a 1hr sightseeing flight (through an established airline) to see the Mont Everest. Awesome.Thank you, Balaram, the days at Kathmandu were very well organized and made the trip a perfect and very pleasurable adventure.

Excellent Nagarkot hiking. Thamel tours made about 5hrs hiking to Nagarkot very memorable. The hiking trail passed through ethnic villages and green sceneries. Thamel Tour: Day Hike followed by city tour. I booked a day hike through Balaram of Thamel Travel and had an exceptional day out. Mostly good some frustrations. In the end my wife and I would use them again. Some problems that were frustrating but always worked out in the end. don day tours looking for himalayes dreams!. Thamel tours provided excellent sightseeing guide and car transfers for a day tours in Kathmandu. Recently i was in Kathmandu for various meetings. Everest base camp trek. Definitely we recommend Thamel Tours for organizing our Everest base camp trek this autumn. From the beginning to end it was magnificent trip. Going to Kathmandu. Do yourself a favour and book your tour with Thamel Travels. I'm 25, from Sydney Australia, and completed the Mt Everest BC trek with three friends through Thamel Travel. I wanted to try a local company, supporting the local workforce, rather than the over-priced, over-crowded Western companies. Best decision ever to book with Balaram at Thamel Travels.He responds to every request at the drop of a hat, and everything ran smooth. Our trip was the BEST, we had a funny, young local guide that was like one of the group. We even got to hang out with our porters. It was never like 'us' and 'them'. Accommodation was great, meals were AWESOME we got to have whatever we wanted. Western companies had limited menus, and groups of 20-50!! We were a group of 4. The best thing is Balaram would've been happy to cater for us if we each wanted a guide to ourselves, and be a group of 1 or 2 persons. He will go above and beyond- it's not just about the money at this company.Our guide even invited us to stay over at his mothers house after the trek, 4 hours out of Kathmandu in the jungle (they didn't have electricity). Traditional meals and celebrating the National holiday with a welcoming local family. You can't buy an experience like that. Shout out to Dipesh and Balaram :) If you're in two minds about which company to choose, don't be. Book with Balaram. On the trek we met and spoke with a lot of other hikers from different companies- I guarantee you Thamel Travels is the best choice.

Truely an excellent service provider!. Truly an excellent service provider. Balaram reached Pokhara to see me and our group after our Annapurna trek. We had very good guide and trekking staffs. Excellent Nepal and Bhutan tours. I agree with other fellow travellers and want to recommend Thamel Tours for holidays in the himalayan countries of Nepal and Bhutan. Life Time Trek To Langtang. We have completed our trek to Langtang region. For this we booked a package trip with Thamel tours. We had very good time and our staff members were very helpful as well. Couldn't have entered Tibet if not for Thamel. But for the persistence and diligence of Balaram in getting Tibet entry permits, I wouldn't have been able to enter Tibet. Having lived and worked in another province in China for many years, I thought I could hire a local Lhasa travel agent to book our tours and get our entry permits. That local travel agent kept giving me excuses about why I couldn't get a Tibet entry permit, etc. My sister (who had just booked with Thamel for a Nepal tour) also wanted to come with me to Tibet, and she suggested I contact Thamel. At first, I couldn't believe that a Nepali travel agent could book a Tibet tour for me. However, Balaram responded almost immediately to all of my questions for several weeks in a row, and true to his word, he eventually got us our Tibet entry permits!The Tibetan tour guide who was assigned to us, Chongdak, was a sweet gal who tried her best to accommodate our every need. Our van driver, Phuntsok, was also very skillful in navigating gigantic potholes on the road going all the way from Lhasa to Shigatse to Everest Base Camp.Since we were on a budget tour, Balaram did warn us that some of the hotels on the way to Everest Base Camp would be a bit substandard. Mostly, I think the hotels had problems dealing with lack of water or water leaks. (Nonetheless, staying in small hotels beats camping in a tent any day.)Thank you, Balaram and Thamel! If I ever get to Nepal one day, I will certainly use your services again! (P.S. Do you do India tours too?)

Best managers in the Himalayas!. We booked our Bhutan Shangrila trip with thamel tours as they had the best prices among few places we enquired. The trip was on full board basis and it was perfect. Beside this we also booked airport transfers with him and everything went so smooth. Balaram and his team are expert to manage the trip to himalays. Happy to use them again for our Tibet trip.

Thank you!!. Our nepal vacation was quiet amazing. We did Annapurna Circuit Trek with Thamel Travels and Tours. Our trekking guide was knowledgable and very helpful. Very accomodating. We made a hasty and rather unplanned holiday to Nepal. With 3 boys in tow, this isnt one of the easiest places in the world to navigate through. Nonetheless, thanks to impeccable planning and assistance from Balaram Pandey of Thamel tours, the trip was very enjoyable memorable. Apart from the friendliness and hospitality, which is a Nepali staple, like their rice and daal (lentils), Balaram impressed us most by reorganising and modifiying our program, stops and hotels on the trot. The vehicle - Toyota Haice, he chose for us was very comfortable and totally roadworthy. The drivers and guides he selected were very good and supportive. His recommendations of hotels and restaurants was spot on. We made many improptu changes to the program, mainly to suit the whims of the boys, from planning the everest flight, to white water rafting to paragliding, all which Balaram handled on the spot with a few phone calls. To top it all, his charges were very reasonable and stayed with us until the final drop off at Katmandu Airport. So whether you are traveling alone, or as a family or a group I would recommend you give him a call.

Everest High passes treks. We booked Everest three passes treks with Thamel tours. I have to mention that our guide was the most experiened guide we met during our trek. Nepal tour via “Thamel Travels and Tours”. We traveled in Nepal via “Thamel Travels and Tours” in Sptember 2013. Recommendation for Thamel Travels and Tours. Cass and I spent 6 weeks in Nepal and booked all of our tours and hotel transfers through Thamel Travels at the recommendation of a friend. Our guide Dipesh, who was very experienced and attentive throughout our trek was also arranged through Thamel Travels. We planned to fly down from Jomsom but due to the weather our guide and Cass organised a jeep to take us down to Pokhara, where Balaram had organised good quality budget accommodation at our request due to our tight budget. Thamel travels also arranged for transport - the tourist bus back to Kathmandu, which was surprisingly comfortable! We then booked a 7 night fly in drive out tour of Tibet, which was again organised for us down to the last detail, Balaram took care of our visas and arranged for a great english speaking guide, with extensive knowledge of Tibetan Culture.We would highly recommend booking any of you day trips, trekking and tours through Thamel travels. They provided good value for money, excellent customer service and took care of all the visa's and arrangements so that we could just enjoy our travels! Our experience with their guides and drivers was also very good and reliable.Laura & Cass, UK 2013
